description.hltext_display: Old York Garden Club holds annual potluck luncheon
description.content:
YORK ? "A Winter Solstice" was the theme of Old York Garden Club's annual potluck luncheon at the First Parish Church in York on Dec. 8.
A variety of winter themes ? Christmas, Hannukuh, Valentine's as well as Under the Snowy Garden, Let's Go Skiing, and Mid Winter's Night Dream, Log Cabin in Winter and Where the Woods & the Sea Meet ? delighted the guests with creative centerpieces and coordinating table settings. Carol Anastas, committee chair, organized this event, which was attended by 88 members.
Entertainment for the December meeting was provided by Joe Dominguez, a talented member of the York Readers Theater and husband of Jeanie Dominguez, club member. Joe recited the beloved holiday classic, "A Cup of Christmas" by Tom Hegg.
Next month Old York Garden Club will host its annual tea party for new members. "The Mad Hatter's Tea Party" will be held Jan. 12 at Fellowship Hall of the First Parish Church. The club will hold a design workshop on Monday, Jan. 10, when members will design centerpieces for Wednesday's meeting.

description.hltext_display: Robot waiters in China never lose patience
description.content:
FILE - In this Dec. 14, 2010 file photo, a robot resembling the star of an animated movie dances to entertain guests at a restaurant in Jinan in eastern China's Shandong province. More than a dozen robots operate in the restaurant as entertainers, servers, greeters and receptionists. Each robot has a motion sensor that tells it to stop when someone is in its path so customers can reach for dishes they want. (AP Photo, File) CHINA OUT
FILE - In this Dec. 14, 2010 file photo, employees refill a robot waiter serving portions of snacks and sauces at a restaurant in Jinan, in eastern China's Shandong province. The restaurant, which opened earlier this month, is touted as China's first robot hotpot eatery. Service with a smile also comes with an electronic voice at the Dalu Robot restaurant, where the hotpot meals are not as famous yet as the staff who never lose their patience and never take tips. (AP Photo, File) CHINA OUT

description.hltext_display: 2010 was a 'Perfect Gift' for Canadian Tenors
description.content:
Damian Dovarganes In this Oct. 8, 2010 photo, the Canadian Tenors, from left, Fraser Walters, Clifton Murray, Victor Micallef and Remigio Pereira pose for a photo in Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Damian Dovarganes)
Loading…
A year after releasing their first hit album, the Canadian Tenors are delivering "The Perfect Gift," a compilation of traditional and contemporary holiday music.
"You have the classics like 'O Holy Night' and 'Silent Night,' but there are songs that are not necessarily Christmas-specific," explained tenor Victor Micallef. "Some great producers worked on that, as well," added band mate Clifton Murray. "'Hallelujah' was (produced by) Bob Ezrin, who worked on 'The Wall.'"
That's as in Pink Floyd's "The Wall" _ just one of many aspects of The Tenors that may surprise. The quartet's clean-cut, all-North American looks scream "pre-fab," and, indeed, the band was the brainchild of Canadian composer Jill Ann Siemens, who first started work on the project some 10 years ago. The current configuration of the group is Victor Micallef, Clifton Murray, Remigio Pereira and Fraser Walters, who said that while they might not have come together organically, that's precisely how they've stayed together.
"Unlike some of these other pre-fab groups, there is a lot of money involved and everything," Pereira said. "We started grassroots and just slowly built up. We cut our teeth on the road doing that. That is how it all happened."
The recent holiday album was released in October, months after the group's debut album "The Canadian Tenors" ranked at the top of Billboard's Classical Albums chart.
Before making inroads stateside, Pereira said, the group did 12 shows in 12 small towns without hitting the two main cities _ Saskatoon, Regina.
By late 2009, the Tenors built a solid Canadian following, then caught the attention of Oprah Winfrey, who invited the members to be guests on her show. After that February 2010 appearance, the quartet quickly experienced the so-called "Oprah Effect."
"It is still happening," said Pereira, with a smile.
The four spend more time together on the road than they do with their families these days. And, yes, they're cool with the term "bromance."
"'Bromance,'" replied Micallef. "It does work, but like any relationship, you have to work on it. And communication is key. As soon as you stop talking, there is a problem. So, half our work is the music and half our work is relationship building. So, it is so important or else this thing wouldn't survive more than a year."
The Canadian Tenors wrapped up its 2010 tour schedule Tuesday night (21 December) in Fort Worth, Texas, then planned head north, to the singers' respective homes for the holidays.
Talk about cutting it close. "It kind of makes sense because Christmas is a very busy time for us," said Murray. "Obviously tenors and Christmas go hand in hand."

the group did 12 shows in 12 small towns without hitting the two main cities _ Saskatoon, Regina
It kind of makes sense because Christmas is a very busy time for us; Obviously tenors and Christmas go hand in hand.

description.hltext_display: 圣诞节催热五星级酒店网络预购
description.content:
圣诞在即，很多时尚且懂得消费的人们更加关注网络预购的方式。中国第一家五星生活消费平台五星汇网站率先推出“圣诞专题”——及时准确地汇集各大酒店的平安夜宴、圣诞大餐，并精挑细选，最终出炉了几家有“资”又有味的上上品：临空皇冠假日酒店、文津国际酒店、国际饭店，以及希尔顿逸林餐厅等17家酒店圣诞庆典资讯。此举不仅使酒店餐饮类网络预购胜况空前，更使之成为了一种鲜见的圣诞时尚。
据悉,五星汇此次推出的圣诞专题秉承了五星汇酒店类餐饮的高品质风范，一方面，着眼于极具特色的平安夜宴与圣诞大餐，另一方面，也在就餐环境上加以更细致地对比与考量。因此，此次推荐皆是精品中的精品。
据介绍，临空皇冠假日不仅以海鲜盛宴、美好菜肴恭候，还将推出令人期待的幸运大抽奖。奖品包括HP笔记本电脑、SONY数码相机、iTouch多媒体播放器、iPad平板电脑、LG液晶电视、诺基亚精美手机、名牌高尔夫套装等高档时尚尤物;文津国际酒店二层的怡多咖啡厅更以不到200元/位的酒店豪华自助晚宴，让消费者尽享京城价格最亲民的“多国”自助;同样，国际饭店28层的旋转餐厅除了倾情推出了成人1388元/位、儿童688元/位等超值消费外，还在紫金大厅备有一场“让经典拨动心弦”的圣诞音乐会。届时，消费者将可以与张宇、阿里郎、潘越云、红缨束等多位明星共度一个梦幻而难忘的平安夜。国际知名品牌希尔顿逸林酒店在圣诞之际，隆重推出了中西分餐制，以满足消费者在同一天享受不同口味的独特需求。
在五星级酒店里尊享饕餮，欢度浪漫圣诞，绝对是一种极其尊贵而美妙的人生体验。五星汇此举切实让网民体验到更加丰富、更加优惠的高品质选择。

description.hltext_display: Operação de Natal da GNR começa na quinta-feira e mobiliza 2200 militares
description.content:
Votar: Rating: 0.0
Opções
a- / a+
Votar: Rating: 0.0
Código da Estrada determina que a multa deve ser aplicada no momento da infracção
David Clifford
A Operação de Natal da GNR começa na quinta-feira e termina no domingo e terá diariamente a patrulhar as estradas cerca de 2200 militares.
A Operação Natal-Ano Novo 2010/2011 da GNR é, como habitualmente, dividida em dois períodos: o primeiro decorrerá de quinta-feira a domingo e o segundo do dia 30 dezembro ao dia 02 janeiro, nas principais estradas do país.
Este ano, a operação de trânsito Natal/Ano Novo será mais curta - quatro dias -- do que no ano passado, porque as duas quadras coincidem com um fim de semana, sendo previsível que as pessoas regressem no domingo, depois de comemorarem o Natal em família, e no dia 02 de janeiro, que calha também num domingo.
Segundo o porta-voz do Comando Geral da GNR, "em média, por dia, estarão diretamente empenhados nas estradas portuguesas cerca de 2200 militares".
Como nos anos anteriores, os militares da Guarda Nacional Republicana (GNR) vão dar especial atenção aos "comportamentos de risco dos condutores", nomeadamente excesso de velocidade e de álcool.
"A principal preocupação será a de proporcionar a fluidez do tráfego, garantindo um permanente apoio a todos os utentes das vias, proporcionando-lhes viagens em segurança, e a reduzir a sinistralidade rodoviária", explicou Pedro Costa Lima à agência Lusa.
Os dados da Operação Natal de 2009 indicam que foram registados 1287 acidentes, que provocaram seis mortos, 33 feridos graves e 355 feridos ligeiros.
No ano passado, na Operação Ano Novo, foram registados 1259 acidentes, dos quais resultaram oito vítimas mortais, 28 feridos graves e 396 feridos ligeiros, em cinco dias.
A Operação Natal começa às 00:00 de quinta-feira e termina às 24:00 de domingo.
*** Este texto foi escrito ao abrigo do novo Acordo Ortográfico ***

description.hltext_display: 《北京草原》述励志青年 非洲“姚明”人见人爱
description.content:
2010年，一个新兴的观影方式出现在百姓生活中，无线视频基地成为新秀导演的新舞台。12月4日，由中国移动、土豆网等发起的G客G拍视频大赛，更是新媒体观影的焦点活动，最终作为影视片大奖的最佳剧情奖，颁发给新秀导演张敏的毕业作品短片《北京草原》。
《北京草原》是学院派新锐导演张敏完成的毕业作品，以短片的形式展现非洲人在北京的生活与故事。片中名为“姚明”的主人公在异国他乡梦想着自己可以和大明星姚明一样人见人爱，于是为了这个梦想而不断努力。
当记者问道《北京草原》剧本创作时，短片制片人张晨介绍说：北京电影学院导演系的毕业生张敏在考虑毕业作品题材的时候，他想起了一位热爱中国文化的同班同学，来自尼日利亚的黑人，他为自己起了个中文名字——姚明!为什么叫姚明?因为所有中国人都认识姚明，喜欢姚明，他希望他在中国能像姚明一样，人见人爱;不断向前跑是他人生的座右铭，对他来说，北京就是让他自由奔跑的草原。
从这部短片的剧情可以看出来，这是一部关于青春与奋斗的话题。近些年类似题材的影视作品不在少数，如果将其拍出新意成为一个难点。《北京草原》这部短片以自己独特的构思从全新的角度分析与解读年轻人的生活状态，从而依靠新鲜的故事与剧情抓住观众的眼睛。

description.hltext_display: Scarlets coach Nigel Davies refuses to get carried away
description.content:
by Gareth Griffiths, Western Mail
SCARLETS supremo Nigel Davies has insisted he won’t allow any complacency to creep in at the high-flying, Llanelli-based outfit.
The Scarlets are the leading Welsh region in the Magners League and Europe going into the festive Christmas and New Year local derbies, making a mockery of pre-season forecasts they would struggle.
But, while his side are second in the league and top of their Heineken Cup pool, Davies insists his team have not achieved anything significant yet.
“I still think there is a cynicism out there about the Scarlets, and rightly so,” said Davies.
“That is how it should be until you win something. We know we still have a lot to prove in that context.
“Considering where we have come from over the last two years and how we have brought this group along with us, we have achieved quite a lot.
“We have not won anything, but have put ourselves in a good position to do so.
“We are pleased with what we have achieved so far, but realise we have a long way to go and things can be taken away from you very quickly in this game.
“That’s why we have to keep the momentum going. We have worked hard to put ourselves in this position and will work hard to ensure we stay in a similar situation for the rest of the season.
“At the moment it is paying dividends for us, but we know we have to ensure there is no complacency here. We haven’t got that at present, though, and I believe we are a humble group.”
Davies reckons the Scarlets’ current lofty position justifies the approach he has adopted over the last two years with young players like Rhys Priestland and Josh Turnbull given chances to shine.
The policy is paying dividends, a fact which was typified by the bonus-point 38-15 victory over Treviso in Italy last weekend, achieved without established quartet Matthew Rees, Stephen Jones, David Lyons and Jonathan Davies.
“What we have achieved to date justifies the programme we have adopted over the last 18 months because we have invested heavily in young players,” added Davies.
“We always had a plan and it is great when it comes together. It is very satisfying for myself and the coaches.
“But it is not just about giving the developing players the faith in themselves by actually playing them, it is also about the environment we create.
“Just giving them the opportunity in itself does not work because it has to be done in the right structure.
“We have worked hard with these boys over the last 18 months. We have a good group of coaches who are working particularly hard to keep their development going.
“It is also good reward for the supporters because they have been through the rough times with us.
“For the fans to see these boys mature and develop has been great and everyone is fully behind us now.”
Davies has revealed he is set to keep his faith in young talent after announcing the Llanelli-based region will not be dipping into the transfer market to solve their tighthead prop injury crisis.
Peter Edwards, Rhys Thomas and Deacon Manu are all currently on the casualty list, with youngster Simon Gardiner holding the fort during the Heineken Cup victories against Treviso.
And Davies will continue to keep faith with Gardiner rather than push the boat out for a star-name signing like Scottish and Lions prop Euan Murray.
“We are going to back ourselves to develop the young talent in the front row,” added Davies.
“It has worked for us in other areas and I don’t see why it can’t work for us in this area.
“Simon Gardiner has done well against Treviso and we are delighted with his progress. We have got other players we are looking at as well who you will see during the rest of the season.
“What I was not going to do was bring in a player who was past his best and who would be stopping the development opportunities of the group we have already got.
“And, while there were some big names out there, we are also working to a budget.”
The Scarlets will be able to gauge how far they have come when they face local rivals and Magners League defending champions, the Ospreys, in the Boxing Day sellout showdown at the Liberty Stadium.
“It is a difficult week because you have got Christmas and we can’t forget it is a big family occasion,” said Davies.
“All the players will be involved in Christmas festivities and the way the players manage themselves this week will be important so they turn up in the right frame of mind.
“But I don’t think that will be a problem for either side.”
Next month, the Scarlets will then find themselves with another huge test when they entertain Leicester in the must-win Heineken Cup showdown.
The Llanelli-based region were handed an early Christmas present last Sunday when pool rivals Leicester and Perpignan drew which has allowed the Scarlets to top the group.
“It was a great result for us and that is the beauty of Europe because any result is possible,” he added.
“In the last three or four years we have not helped ourselves, but we have not had great results go our way either.
“Getting 15 points from four games is pretty significant and this result has also gone our way. Leicester is now a hugely significant game for us, but it was always going to be because you have to win your home games. There is added significance because of the way in which we played against them last time.
“That was the only game we weren’t good enough to win this season and we will want to try and put that right. It won’t be easy because they are a quality and experienced outfit who are used to these huge European encounters. But this is where we want to be.”

event_or_fact.property: ?It is a difficult week because you have got Christmas and we can?t forget it is a big family occasion,?
?I still think there is a cynicism out there about the Scarlets, and rightly so,?

description.hltext_display: Energy-efficient rules should not be required
description.content:
Wednesday’s News & Record carried an article on energy-efficient housing rules and focused on a catch regarding smoke detectors.
I suggest the real catch lies in an argument similar to that currently in the courts by the “Obamacare” requirement to buy insurance.
Why should the state have any power at all to dictate energy-saving requirements?
What’s to be required next — windows that wash themselves or self-cleaning gutters?
They too might be cost-effective for the owner, but they should be an option for the owner, not required by some third party.

description.content: Egyes vezető fideszes politikusok népszerűsége esett, sok szocialistáé nőtt. Továbbra is Orbán az első és Gyurcsány az utolsó.

description.hltext_display: Lebanon-based Cracker Barrel takes Southern fare to Northern borders
description.content:
SOUTH PORTLAND, Maine — Southern-fried restaurant chain Cracker Barrel is finding hungry customers in the land of lobster, steamers and baked beans.
Cracker Barrel General Store's first restaurant in Maine represents the chain's northernmost foray along the East Coast. And Mainers seem to be taking a shine to the chicken and dumplings, biscuits and sawmill gravy, and other Southern staples such as turnip greens, pork barbecue and grits.
Well, scratch the grits.
"I'll try anything once, but I'm not trying those grits. No way," Sandra Butler of South Portland said with a chuckle, after giving fried okra and turnip greens a try.
Southern cooking knows no boundaries, apparently. The South Portland restaurant was running 25 percent ahead of projections when it opened last month, according to the company.
Decorated with antiques, rocking chairs and checkerboards, the restaurant presents a familiar face to New Englanders who've traveled through Florida and other parts of the South where Cracker Barrels are a highway fixture. And they've developed a loyal following, even far north of the Mason-Dixon line.
Chris and Anne Taylor of Topsham readily confess that they used to drive two hours to eat at a Cracker Barrel in Massachusetts before the South Portland restaurant opened. Now the restaurant is only 30 miles away, and they've made it a Wednesday night ritual to dine there for "date night."
"The nice thing about a place like this is you get to experience a little taste of another part of the country cuisine that you don't get if you grow up in Maine," he said.
Different fare
New England isn't exactly known for daring cuisine.
Staples include baked cod and haddock, pulled from the North Atlantic. In the summer, there are steamed mussels and clams. And of course, New England is known for chowder, lobster and baked bean suppers.
Cracker Barrel's menu is different. It features things such as country-fried steak, fried chicken, fried chicken livers and catfish; fried apples, pinto beans, turnip greens and hashbrown casserole; for dessert there's a plethora of cobblers.

description.hltext_display: Christmas services around York
description.content:
To celebrate the Christ in Christmas, churches around town will be holding special services this week. They're sure to include carols, some candlelight, and definitely some peace and quiet after what surely has been a hectic week. Here is a compilation of local services:
The United Methodist Church of York/Ogunquit on Route 1 will host a 7 p.m. Christmas Eve candlelight service. St. George's Episcopal Church at 407 York St. will offer three services on Christmas Eve: 4:30 p.m. family Eucharist, 7:30 p.m. Holy Eucharist with choir, and 11 p.m. "midnight" Holy Eucharist with carol singing. On Christmas, a Holy Eucharist service starts at 10 a.m. The Cape Neddick Baptist Church celebrates the season with a 7 p.m. candlelight service on Christmas Eve. St. Christopher Church at 4 Barrell Lane will hold Christmas Eve vigils at 4 and 6 p.m., as well as a Nativity of the Lord service at 8 a.m. Christmas Day. First Parish Church at 180 York St. will offer a Family Mitten Tree Service at 5:30 p.m. Christmas Eve, as well as candlelight services at 8 and 11 p.m. York Street Baptist Church will hold a Christmas Eve candlelight service at 7 p.m.
St. George's welcomes rector
The Rev. Calvin Sanborn has accepted the call to be the new rector of St. George's Episcopal Church in York Harbor. He began his work Dec. 13, and celebrated Sunday services for the first time as rector Dec. 19. Sanborn brings diverse experience to St. George's ? he was the assistant rector there from September 2002 to September 2004. After that, he spent a year at New York University in New York City as the Episcopal chaplain. More recently, he was the rector of St. Matthew's Episcopal Church in Hallowell for five years. Sanborn holds several degrees, including his undergraduate from St. Joseph's College in Standish, a master's degree in divinity from Episcopal Divinity School in Cambridge, Mass., and a master's degree in sacred theology from The General Theological Seminary of the Episcopal Church in New York City. He has been active on diocesan committees, including the Anti-Racism Task Force, the Bishop Search Committee and the Mission Strategy Committee.

description.hltext_display: 6位行业精英加盟盛大 运营游戏最高可拿20%分成
description.author: dlgboy
description.content:
据盛大网络最新发布的第三季度《员工发展报告》披露，在8月20日盛大游戏举办的第十届产品经理/总监招标会上，共有35名来自腾讯、巨人以及海外同行业的、拥有丰富运营经验的候选人参加了招标会，最终签约6人。
盛大游戏产品经理/总监招标作为“20计划”的重要载体之一，至今已举办十届。它在为优秀游戏运营人才提供挑战梦想、自我飞跃机会的同时，还分享给游戏运营团队最高达20%的分成。产品经理/总监招标活动自举办以来，已为包括《龙之谷》在内的多款游戏大作吸引了几十位精英人才。报告同时还披露，第11届产品经理/总监招标也将于12月20日举行。据了解，盛大游戏正在为包括《传奇3》等在内的游戏招募产品经理和运营团队成员。
据悉，盛大网络是互联网行业首个发布《员工发展报告》的企业，从2010年第二季度发布以来已获得良好的社会反响，该报告每个季度定期对外发布。这份《员工发展报告》将详细总结盛大每个阶段人才发展情况，从吸引人才、培育人才、留住人才、人尽其才等方面揭示盛大对企业软性环境的塑造，为外界全方位了解盛大的人才战略和人才培养提供了一个直观的窗口。

description.hltext_display: 山西煤焦领域反腐败打黑 九百余政府官员落马
description.content:
中新社太原12月22日电 (记者 张恩)记者22日在山西煤焦领域反腐败专项斗争查处案件情况新闻发布会上了解，山西省加大煤焦领域发腐败专项行动，提高办案的整体效能，今年1至11月，906名政府公职人员 相继“落马”，依法受到严厉惩处。 山西省检察厅副厅长邢顺喜介绍，截止今年11月，山西各级煤焦领域发腐败专项斗争领导组办公室共立查案件2185件，处分2353人。今年1至11月，山西全省共受理民众信访举报759件，立案591件，初核煤焦领域违纪线索718件，立案查处591件，处分违纪干部906人，涉及厅级干部7人，县处级干部109人，乡科级干部262人。
记者在此间获悉，今年山西已查处及正查处的典型案件令人触目惊心。如大同市原副市长王雁峰在煤矿置换过程中收受巨额贿赂案、大同市公安局原局长申公元在煤矿置换过程中收受巨额贿赂案、晋城市煤炭局总工程师、党组成员刘俊文收受有关煤矿负责人贿赂108万元人民币，巨额财产441万元来源不明案等。
有关人士指出，山西煤焦领域案件查办行动将继续进行。今后要健全办案的激励和制约机制，重点查处政府官员插手煤焦业务入股、牟取暴利、利用审批监管、资金划拨、票据管理、权钱交易，利用资源整合倒卖国有资源、利用批煤发煤、基本建设、资产评估、大宗物资采购，从事商业贿赂以及私挖滥采背后黑“保护伞”等违纪违法案件。
这位负责人强调，山西在煤焦领域专项行动中实行严格问责制，对瞒案不报、压案不批、有案不查者，加大责任查究。(完)

description.hltext_display: HK stocks edge up in thin turnover, Cheung Kong gains
description.content:
HONG KONG, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Hong Kong stocks edged higher on Wednesday despite a reversal in mainland markets, although a year-end slowdown in trading activity kept turnover at its lowest in more than 3-Â½ months.
The benchmark Hang Seng Index .HSI closed up 0.22 percent at 23,045.19. The China Enterprises Index .HSCE ended flat as mainland markets reversed course to close lower on the day.
Li Ka-shing's Cheung Kong (Holdings) Ltd 0001.HK was the biggest boost to the benchmark, rising 3.5 percent after the company said it planned to launch Hong Kong's first yuan-denominated IPO as early as next year. [ID:nTOE6BL01N] (Reporting by Vikram Subhedar; Editing by Chris Lewis) (vikram.subhedar@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6975; Reuters Messaging: vikram.subhedar.reuters.com@reuters.net))
2010-12-22 10:12:24

description.hltext_display: Kassa voor kennis universiteiten
description.content:
De universiteiten van Delft, Twente, Tilburg, Wageningen en Utrecht krijgen samen € 25 miljoen om onderwijs en onderzoek meer toe te snijden op de ontwikkeling van maatschappelijk en commercieel interessante toepassingen.
Het geld is afkomstig uit het zogeheten valorisatieprogramma dat in opdracht van de ministeries van Economische Zaken, Landbouw en Innovatie (EL&I) en van Onderwijs Cultuur en Wetenschappen (OCW) wordt uitgevoerd door het Agentschap NL.
“De kennis in de hoofden van studenten, docenten en hoogleraren is goud waard," zegt minister Verhagen (EL&I). "De potentie van de kennisinstellingen voor onze economie en voor ons land is enorm. Toepassing van die kennis is kassa voor wetenschappers, universiteiten en bedrijven."
De toekenning van de 25 miljoen euro is een belangrijke stap om kennis bij universiteiten beter ten gelde maken en maatschappelijk te benutten. Universiteiten kunnen met deze fondsen bijvoorbeeld colleges geven aan studenten over het starten van eigen bedrijf, of onderzoekers bijstaan om hun wetenschappelijke kennis om te zetten in patenten voor aantrekkelijke diensten en producten.
Toepassing van wetenschappelijke kennis in commerciële en maatschappelijke producten en diensten is een prioriteit van het kabinet. In 2011 is er opnieuw geld beschikbaar om plannen van kennisinstellingen te helpen financieren. De ministeries van EL&I en OCW maken de omvang van deze fondsen binnenkort bekend.

description.hltext_display: Hoh, hoh! Doch noch schöne Weihnachten auf Schalke, mit Urlaubsverlängerung!
description.content:
Es kann also doch noch ein besinnliches und ruhiges Weihnachtsfest beim FC Schalke 04 geben. Noch zu Beginn der Saison, besser gesagt, noch vor wenigen Wochen, sah es danach wahrlich nicht aus. Abstiegskampf und Krisenstimmung erhielten Einzug bei den Schalkern. Aus „Königsblaue“ wurde „Mausgrau“ – jetzt zeigt die Formkurve aber wieder deutlich nach oben!
Share Share
Schalkes Jefferson Farfan im Duell mit Augsburgs Tobias Werner ()
Zum Thema
(seh) Augsburg. Der FC Schalke 04 hat das Viertelfinale des DFB-Pokals erreicht. Beim FC Augsburg, dem Tabellenführer der 2. Bundesliga, gewann S04 mit 1:0 (0:0). Jefferson Farfan erzielte in der 84. Minute das entscheidende Tor und sorgte somit für einen guten Hinrunden-Abschluss.
Verlängerte Weihnachtsferien
Die Belohnung für das Weiterkommen im DFB-Pokal erfolgte gleich nach dem Abpfiff. „Jetzt haben wir uns noch mal ein paar Tage mehr verdient“, erklärte S04-Coach Felix Magath, der den Winterurlaub seiner Schützlinge eigentlich verkürzen wollte. Die Weihnachtsferien wurden somit um fünf Tage bis zum 2. Januar verlängert.
Weihnachts-Kurve bekommen
Überhaupt scheint pünktlich vor dem Weihnachtsfest wieder gute Stimmung auf Schalke zu herrschen. Der enttäuschende und schwache Saisonstart wurde in den vergangenen Partien vergessen gemacht. Pünktlich vor dem Jahreswechsel bekamen die „Königsblauen“ die Kurve. In der Champions League wurde das Achtelfinale erreicht, in der Bundesliga gelang der Sprung auf Platz zehn und abschließend wurde auch der DFB-Pokaleinzug in das Viertelfinale perfekt gemacht.
„Natürlich war es schwer, aber das war zu erwarten. Augsburg steht nicht umsonst in der 2. Liga oben“, analysierte Magath nach dem DFB-Pokalspiel in Augsburg. Vor 30.660 Zuschauern in der ausverkauften Impuls-Arena tat sich die Magath-Elf jedoch lange Zeit sehr schwer. Die Motivationsspritze mit der Aussicht auf eine längere Weihnachtspause zeigte erst in der Schlussphase seine Wirkung, als die Gastgeber schwächer und die Schalker stärker wurden. Aus „Königsblaue“ wurde zu Saisonbeginn „Mausgrau“ – jetzt zeigt die Formkurve aber wieder deutlich nach oben!

description.hltext_display: Population surge gives Texas 4 new US House seats
description.content:
AUSTIN, Texas -- A surge of Hispanic residents and other population gains have Texas poised to add more congressional clout than any other state, but a partisan fight now looms over exactly where the new seats should go.
Texas is gaining four seats in the U.S. House, twice as many as Florida, the only other state to pick up multiple ones, according to new population figures announced Tuesday by the U.S. Census Bureau. All told, Republican-leaning states will pick up at least a half dozen House seats thanks to the 2010 census, which found the nation's population growing more slowly than in past decades but still shifting to the South and West.
With Texas Republicans using recent elections to fortify their already solid control of the state Legislature, the political process of redrawing the state's congressional map would seem to benefit the GOP, too.
But Democrats say not so fast.
Boyd Richie, chairman of the Texas Democratic Party, said Hispanic and black population growth account for the additional seats, and he vowed to fight for a redistricting plan that takes their numbers into account.
"A legal and fair redistricting process must produce new congressional districts that reflect the Hispanic and African American population growth," Richie said. "Our Democratic numbers may be down, but we are not out. Democrats cannot and will not allow our voices to be silenced in this critical process."
The Census Bureau said the nation's population on April 1 was 308,745,538, up from 281.4 million a decade ago. The growth rate for the past decade was 9.7 percent, the lowest since the Great Depression. The U.S. population grew by 13.2 percent from 1990 to 2000. Michigan was the only state to lose population during the past decade. Nevada, with a 35 percent increase, was the fastest-growing state.
The new numbers are a boon for Republicans, with Texas leading the way among GOP-leaning states that will gain House seats, mostly at the Rust Belt's expense. Following each once-a-decade census, the nation must reapportion the House's 435 districts to make them roughly equal in population, with each state getting at least one seat.
In all, the census figures show a shift affecting 18 states taking effect when the 113th Congress takes office in 2013. The political power follows the high population growth, shifting toward the south and west and away from the industrial Midwest and northeast.
With reapportionment settled, the far more politically divisive process of redistricting is set to begin. In Texas, both major parties were bracing for a showdown over the state's new residents, beginning a fight that is sure to spark court action. But with Republican supermajorities in the Legislature, the temptation to run the table will be strong.

description.hltext_display: Republicans ignoring middle class Americans
description.content:
Why do Republicans in Washington dislike poor people and favor rich people?
Because you dance with the one that brought you. Have you seen many minorities at Republican rallies or conventions? Not a lot of dark faces. GOP speakers sound mean-spirited and are single-minded. Republicans are tough — tough on the middle class and working poor.
However, the hard-working middle class and senior citizens have been championed by Democrats who fought for and got better working conditions in factories, coal mines, farms and Social Security and Medicare and civil rights for the disenfranchised.
All we can hope for is a fair shake. Presently, things are lopsided due to failed Republican policies.
We have high unemployment through no fault of the workers. Wall Street got bailed out and is now making even more money and getting larger bonuses than before. The rich get richer — the poor get poorer — more homeless and hungry. Shame on America.
By using tax cuts to bankrupt the U.S. Treasury, Republicans can achieve their prime goals of eliminating Social Security and Medicare. With no funds for these vital programs, draconian cuts become necessary which will gut them.
Strangely, some of my best friends are Republicans.

description.hltext_display: TopSURV 8 sets new industry standards for field data collection and control
description.content:
Topcon Positioning Systems? (TPS) TopSURV 8, the newest version of the popular TopSURV field controller software series, has enhancements to increase productivity on a variety of survey jobs.
The new software provides significant new functionality on cross-section staking on roads, import and export of road strings, graphical user interface, multiple new map views, file import/export, in-field status reporting and much more.
Jason Hallett, TPS senior manager for application software, said, ?TopSURV sets the industry standard for field data collection. TopSURV 8 provides field functionality, flexibility, and customization not found in any other field package, while further simplifying and increasing the speed of data collection and delivery.? TopSURV software is used to collect data with Topcon?s complete lineup of field controllers, as well as the innovative GRS-1 GNSS RTK receiver. TopSURV 8 controls all of Topcon?s positioning hardware, including GNSS receivers, Millimeter GPS+, total stations, robotic total stations and digital levels. ?No matter how many instruments the surveyor uses,? Hallett said, ?TopSURV stores configuration files for every Topcon instrument so there is no wasted configuration time. Switching between various field tools is a snap. ?TopSURV 8 is the perfect software for any ?office-to-field-to-office? solution that a surveyor or a civil engineer might need,? Hallett said. ?From basic operation to the most advanced slope staking and roading routines, the package offers an unprecedented level of customization to work as simply or as detailed as the project requires. ?There is no question. TopSURV 8 is the best the industry has to offer.? Topcon Positioning Systems, Inc. (TPS) designs and manufactures precise positioning products and solutions for the global surveying, construction, agriculture, civil engineering, mapping and GIS, asset management and mobile control markets. TPS? parent company, Topcon Corporation (Tokyo Stock Exchange ? 7732), was founded in 1932.

description.hltext_display: CBS announces midseason changes, adds 3 rookies
description.content:
Prime-time leader CBS is tweaking its schedule to bring midseason shows aboard.
Joining the CBS lineup is spinoff series "Criminal Minds: Suspect Behavior," which will debut Feb. 16. Other newcomers are the comedy "Mad Love," debuting Feb. 21, and the spy drama "Chaos" starting April 1.
As part of the shuffle, the Tom Selleck police drama "Blue Bloods" will move to 10 p.m. ET Wednesday for four weeks beginning Jan. 19, then return to its 10 p.m. ET Friday home in February.
"Rules of Engagement," now airing Monday, will pair with sitcom sibling "The Big Bang Theory" on Thursday at 8:30 p.m. ET starting Feb. 24. It's replacing "(Bleep) My Dad Says" with William Shatner, which will wrap for the season.
"The Defenders," starring Jim Belushi and Jerry O'Connell, will end its season run with a shift to 8 p.m. ET Friday starting Feb. 4. CBS didn't announce whether it or the Shatner comedy will be renewed for next year.

description.hltext_display: Scoach/Scoach (Frankfurt) - DAX auf Schlussniveau erwartet
description.content:
Der Leitindex Dax dürfte am Mittwoch mit leichten Gewinnen in den Handel starten. Darauf deuten die vorbörslichen Indikatoren. Der DAX-Future, der durch den X-DAX berechnet wird, notiert zur Stunde bei 7.081 Punkten. Dies entspricht einem Zuwachs von 3 Punkten gegenüber dem gestrigen Schlusskurs. Am Dienstag kletterte das Börsenbarometer um 0,85 Prozent auf 7.078 Punkte. Widerstände: 7.075 + 7.101 + 7.135/7.140 + 7.163/7.190 Unterstützungen: 7.060/7.065 + 7.043
Die Vorgaben von den internationalen Börsen sind gemischt. An der Wall Street verbesserte sich der Dow Jones am Dienstag um 0,48 Prozent auf 11.533 Zähler. In Asien ging der Nikkei am Morgen hingegen mit einem Minus von 0,23 Prozent bei 10.346 Punkten aus dem Handel. Der Euro zeigt sich im frühen Handel etwas fester. Die europäische Gemeinschaftswährung kostet zur Stunde 1,3130 US-Dollar. Das sind 0,24 Prozent mehr als am Dienstag. Der Ölpreis ist am Morgen über die Marke von 90 US-Dollar gestiegen. Ein Barrel der US-Sorte WTI für die Auslieferung im Februar kostet zur Stunde 90,03 US-Dollar. Das sind 21 Cent mehr als gestern Abend. *Ausblick Termine:*

The baby is the first child for both the Wedding Crashers star and his wife, who's a Canadian real estate agent.

description.hltext_display: Vols drop 3rd straight game, 65-64 to Southern Cal
description.content:
Posted:
Report an Error
See a mistake on this page?
6 Sports Director
KNOXVILLE (WATE) - Bruce Pearl is on the verge of entering uncharted territory as Tennessee's head coach. The Vols lost their third straight game Tuesday night, 65-64 to Southern Cal at Thompson-Boling Arena.
Pearl has never lost four straight games as UT's head coach.
After back-to-back losses to Oakland and Charlotte, the Vols were looking to return to their winning ways against a Trojan team coached by former Tennessee head coach Kevin O'Neill.
But Southern Cal played O'Neill's trademark style, with tenacious defense-- and scored 27 points off Tennessee turnovers.
The Vols trailed by 10 points with 8:33 to go in the first half. Tennessee pulled to within 4 points early in the second half, but Southern Cal again built their lead to 10 after a 3-point shot by Trojan guard Maurice Jones.
Jones led USC with 15 points. Jio Fontan and Alex Stepheson each scored 13 for Southern Cal. Bryce Jones added 11.
The Vols fought back, and managed to take a 2-point lead twice in the second half. But each time, Trojans guards countered with shots that erased Tennessee's advantage.
The Vols had a chance to win the game with :04 left, but Tobias Harris rimmed an 18-foot jumper from the wing to seal the win for Southern Cal.
The Vols were led by freshman Tobias Harris, who scored 14 points. Cameron Tatum scored 12 while Melvin Goins added 10. Brian Williams scored 9 points and grabbed 9 rebounds for Tennessee.
After starting the season 7-0, and earning a No. 7 national ranking, the Vols have now lost three straight.
It's the second time in Pearl's Tennessee career that his team has lost three consecutive games, and it's the first time under Pearl the Vols have lost 3-in-a-row to unranked teams.

description.hltext_display: The Ogunquit Playhouse receives award for outstanding achievement
description.content:
OGUNQUIT ? The Ogunquit Playhouse has announced it received the Award for Outstanding Achievement in American Theatre from the New England Theatre Conference at its 59th annual convention, held this fall in New Haven, Conn.
Jeff Watts, NETC president, presented Executive Artistic Director Bradford Kenney an award recognizing the playhouse as one of the most important cultural landmarks in New England. Among the many accolades Watts shared with audience members, who represented theaters from all over New England, he thanked the Ogunquit Playhouse for producing the highest quality Broadway plays and musicals since 1933.
The New England Theatre Conference Inc. is a nonprofit corporation composed of individuals and organizations that are active or interested in the performing arts. It is committed to develop, expand and assist theatre activity in New England on the educational, community and professional levels.
For playhouse information, visit www.ogunquitplayhouse.org.

description.hltext_display: “古装硬汉”何晟铭南方盛典斩获新人奖，吐露新路历程
description.content:
近日，以“大剧在南方”为主题的2010南方盛典·年度影视颁奖礼在广州顺利落下帷幕。有“古装硬汉”之称的青年演员何晟铭(原“中国力量”何敏)在《美人天下》热拍之余抽身出席南方盛典，并凭借《大丫鬟》中的沈流年一角摘得了最佳新人奖的桂冠。
娱乐圈历练十四载 “新人奖来的并不迟”
何晟铭此番出席南方盛典，是从正在横店热拍的宫廷悬疑大戏《美人天下》剧组抽身而至，何晟铭正在向一个更成熟的演员迈进。也许不少人见到何晟铭都会觉得眼熟，不仅因为近几年何晟铭凭借多部影视作品在荧屏上频繁曝光，还因为他正是十年前红遍中国一时的“中国力量”歌唱组合的成员何敏。
虽然何晟铭真正成为一名演员的时间并不长，但是从1996年，刚刚20岁的何晟铭以歌手身份出道，到今天拿到新人奖已经过去了14年的时间。当获奖后有媒体提问“这个奖是不是来得有点晚了?”何晟铭却答道：“我觉得一点也不晚，相反我认为非常的及时，因为我刚刚开始做演员，是名副其实的新人。现在颁给我这个奖是观众对我的认同，这是拍戏三年的回馈。这是一个好的起点。”虽然当年做歌手的时候大大小小的奖拿了不少，但是此次南方盛典的新人奖却对何晟铭有格外的意义，何晟铭坦言：“因为相较于做歌手的时候，自己现在更加成熟，不管在娱乐圈多少年，我一直在坚持我需要的东西。最大的幸福莫过于信仰实现。这是自己成为演员后第一次被认可，对于自己是莫大的鼓励。”
三十岁转行做演员 “离四十岁还有很久”
何晟铭开始转行做演员始于3年前，当年身为歌手的何晟铭暂时放弃了发展，回归校园，进入北京电影学院表演系进修。何晟铭毕业后，《玫瑰江湖》是自己的第一部作品，此次获奖的《大丫鬟》是何晟铭2009年的作品。谈及自己30岁才开始当演员，何晟铭归结为“缘分”：“我期待那种被欣赏，被认可，被尊重的过程，我要以全新的身份证明我的坚持，实现我的信仰。”
虽然在娱乐圈摸爬滚打数年，但是鉴于何晟铭出道很早，所以如今十四年过去了，何晟铭却也还算“正当年”。不过，此次南方盛典与何晟铭同时获得新人奖的还有在新版《红楼梦》中扮演小宝钗的“90后”演员李沁。与90后一起站在领奖台上，何晟铭到显得像个十足的“老人”，对于年龄，何晟铭笑称：“男人30岁才是开始，我离40岁还有很久。10年歌手让我学会很多，接下来的十年我要成为一个好演员。”
感恩粉丝默默支持 “用好作品说话”
随着何晟铭事业的逐渐攀升，其粉丝队伍也在不断发展壮大。南方盛典颁奖典礼现场，更有不少何晟铭的粉丝亲自到场助阵，让何晟铭十分感动。值得一提的是，在何晟铭的粉丝中，不仅有这几年通过影视剧结缘的影迷，还更有从何晟铭歌手时代便一路关注至今的歌迷。粉丝们的存在让何晟铭的感激之情溢于言表：“我的粉丝和我的性格很像，都是静静地，默默地，有自己的坚持。”对于未来，何晟铭说：“我会非常非常努力的去工作，要拿出更多更好的作品，用好作品说话。” (福星)

description.hltext_display: IWF schließt Verkauf von gut 400 Tonnen Gold ab
description.content: Zunächst hatte der IWF das Gold direkt an Notenbanken verkauft. Indien, Mauritius und Sri Lanka hatten dem IWF gut 200 Tonnen abgekauft. Die restlichen Verkäufe sollten zeitlich gestreckt über die Märkte erfolgen. Der Goldpreis ist binnen eines Jahres um gut 28 Prozent auf zuletzt rund 1.389,55 Dollar je Feinunze (rund 31,1 Gramm) gestiegen. Der Rekord von 1.430,95 Dollar vom 7. Dezember bleibt somit in Reichweite./jha/bgf

description.hltext_display: Aussies in afternoon clash with Samoa
description.author: Our Correspondent
description.content:
AUSTRALIA will open their 2011 international campaign with a rare afternoon Test against Samoa at Sydney’s ANZ Stadium on July 17.
It will be the first of five Tests for Robbie Deans’ men in the lead-up to Australia’s 2011 Rugby World Cup opener against Italy in early September.
The Wallabies have won all five of their meetings against Samoa, but Deans says the match will be the perfect starting point ahead of a massive campaign.
"The Samoans will be building to the Rugby World Cup themselves which will ensure they field a strong side,” Deans said.
"They are capable, their recent results in the northern hemisphere show that.
"They are in a position to field an experienced group, a lot of who have played in the southern hemisphere and against a lot of our players in Super Rugby so they won’t be overawed by the occasion, they’ll be looking forward to it.”
Australia will also play home and away Tri Nations matches against New Zealand and South Africa in July and August before heading to New Zealand.

event_or_fact.property: the match will be the perfect starting point ahead of a massive campaign

description.hltext_display: Punjab information commission under...
description.content:
Chandigarh: Right to Information (RTI) activists on Monday demonstrated outside the Punjab State Information Commission here to protest delays in giving details to applicants.
Carrying placards and banners against Chief Information Commissioner (CIC) RI Singh, the activists raised slogans against the commission.
"The people who are running the State Information Commission are least bothered about the common man. This is our first phase of agitation and we will intensify it in the coming days," said HC Arora, president of RTI Activists' Federation, Punjab, while talking to reporters.
"RI Singh is working with a closed mind to derail the RTI Act in Punjab. He is deliberately delaying the process of furnishing information to applicants. Information commissioners are very irregular and they sit for only two-three days, for only a few hours, in their offices in the entire week," he added.
Arora said they submitted a charter of demands to the commission November 16 but so far they had not received any response.
"There are many cases where information commissioners have snubbed appellants and complainants," said Arora, who is himself a lawyer.
Chief Information Commissioner Singh denied the allegations.
"We have already sent our recommendations, over their charter of demands, to the governor. We are working in a very transparent manner and every information is displayed on our website and notice-boards. We are always ready to meet and discuss things with anyone," Singh said.
The federation announced that it would publish a booklet named ‘One hundred ridiculous decisions of Punjab State Information Commission' in January next year.

description.hltext_display: “梨园闯关我挂帅” 雷佳重拾花鼓戏唱段
description.content:
12月22日晚，总政歌舞团青年歌唱家雷佳将参加戏曲频道新节目《梨园闯关我挂帅》的录制，作为表演嘉宾现场演唱花鼓戏《放风筝》，并和央视主持人李佳明、方琼积极互动。
雷佳中学就是在湖南艺术学校学的戏曲，花鼓戏是她的必修课。学戏曲免不了的就是早起练功，这对一个半大的孩子来说是个不小的考验，再加上湖南的冬天又湿又冷，赖床是常有的事情。一到这个时候学校的老师们就只好挨个敲开宿舍门叫他们起床督促他们练功。但也正因为艺术学校老师们的督促，雷佳打下了良好的基础。在出演总政歌舞团原创歌剧《木兰诗篇》时，雷佳凭借当年的戏曲功底把大段的舞剑桥段表演得淋漓尽致，巡演至俄罗斯马林斯基剧院，剧院艺术总监捷杰耶夫很是惊叹：“这是我第一次在歌剧舞台上看到中国功夫，非常地美妙”。
《梨园闯关我挂帅》是一档益智游戏类戏曲综艺节目，以轻松愉快的趣味答题，紧张新鲜的闯关游戏以及各路明星的加盟演出等方式传播推广国粹艺术。本次担任央视《梨园闯关我挂帅》的表演嘉宾表演地道的花鼓戏，雷佳表示很兴奋：“很高兴能有这个机会来参加节目，感觉仿佛又回到了青涩的学生时代。”

description.hltext_display: Yizheng, Far Eastern New Century to build PTA plant in east China
Wertloser Sieg: Skyliners scheiden trotz 72:60 aus
description.content:
Deutsche Bank Skyliners
Bilderstrecke: Skyliners vs. Yuzhny
Zum vorherigen Bild Zum nächsten Bild
Mit 72:60 verabschieden sich die Deutsche Bank Skyliners am Dienstagabend im Spiel gegen Yuzhny (Ukraine) von der Eurochallenge. Im Bild: DaShaun Wood (Frankfurt) gegen Stanislav Zavadskyi (Khimik) Alle Bilder: bild pressehaus
Frankfurt. Außer Spesen nichts gewesen: Die Frankfurt Skyliners sind wieder einmal in der Vorrunde eines europäischen Wettbewerbs ausgeschieden.
Joe Dabbert (Frankfurt) gegen Curtis Millage (Khimik) und Edin Bavcic (Khimik). Foto: Bild PressehausDer deutsche Basketball-Vizemeister gewann zwar gestern das abschließende Spiel gegen Khimik Yuzhny (Ukraine) mit 72:60 (35:38). Doch der dritte Sieg im sechsten Spiel reichte nicht aus, um ins Achtelfinale einzuziehen.
Das enttäuschende Aus stand kurioserweise bereits vor der Partie fest. Denn das Spiel zwischen Gruppensieger BK Ventspils und Maccabi Haifa (99:62) hatte zwei Stunden früher begonnen. Durch den Sieg der Letten hatte Frankfurt keine Chance mehr, das punktgleiche Haifa noch von Platz zwei der Gruppe B zu verdrängen: Die Israelis hatten den direkten Vergleich gegen die Hessen gewonnen.
Immerhin zeigten die Skyliners in der Ballsporthalle vor der Minus-Kulisse von nur rund 500 Zuschauern gute Moral. Topscorer waren Wood (18 Punkte) und McKinney (16).
Der europäische Basketball-Verband sorgte mit der unterschiedlichen Zeitansetzung der Partien in Ventspils und Frankfurt für Verwunderung. «Das ist sehr ungewöhnlich. Normalerweise spielt man zeitgleich», sagte Skyliners-Sportdirektor Kamil Novak.
Die Frankfurter nahmen zum achten Mal an einem europäischen Wettbewerb teil. Nur ein einziges Mal, 2000 im Saporta-Cup, waren sie ins Achtelfinale eingezogen. joi

description.hltext_display: Craig Jackson Promoted to DPL Vice President and Treasurer
description.content:
DPL Inc. (NYSE: DPL) announced today that Craig Jackson has been promoted to vice president and treasurer of DPL and The Dayton Power and Light Company.
Jackson has served in various capacities within the financial area of the company, most recently as vice president and assistant treasurer. In his new role as an executive officer of the company, he will be responsible for financial planning, treasury, enterprise risk management and investor relations. ?Craig?s solid financial background, leadership skills and knowledge of the energy industry are an asset to the company, and his promotion to the executive officer level has been well earned,? said Fred Boyle, DPL chief financial officer.
Jackson earned a bachelor's in business administration from Bloomsburg University of Pennsylvania, and an MBA from Wright State University. He is the Chair of Rebuilding Together Dayton, a local non-profit organization dedicated to rehabbing owner-occupied homes at no cost to low-income homeowners.
About DPL
DPL Inc. (NYSE:DPL) is a regional energy company. DPL was named one of for the second consecutive year in 2010. DPL?s principal subsidiaries include The Dayton Power and Light Company (DP&L); DPL Energy, LLC (DPLE); and DPL Energy Resources, Inc. (DPLER). DP&L, a regulated electric utility, provides service to over 500,000 retail customers in West Central Ohio; DPLE engages in the operation of merchant peaking generation facilities; and DPLER is a competitive retail electric supplier in Ohio, selling to major industrial and commercial customers. DPL, through its subsidiaries, owns and operates approximately 3,700 megawatts of generation capacity, of which 2,800 megawatts are low cost coal-fired units and 900 megawatts are natural gas and diesel peaking units. Further information can be found at www.dplinc.com.

description.hltext_display: YAA scholarship goes to Isabella Rotman
description.content:
YORK ? The York Art Association's scholarship committee has announced that York resident Isabella Rotman was selected to receive the 2010 Letitia Moore Charitable Trust Scholarship in the amount of $7,500. Rotman is a sophomore bachelor of fine arts student at the School of the Art Institute of Chicago.
Rotman is a graduate of York High School and was the recipient of York Art Association's scholarship for high school graduates in 2009. Despite her age, Rotman has already received many accolades and was a recipient of a School of the Art Institute of Chicago Merit Award, The Maine Arts Education Award upon graduation from high school, scholastic art and writing awards (both national and state-level awards), a Seacoast Art Association scholarship, an Ogunquit Playhouse scholarship, and even a Haystack Student Weekend Scholarship. Rotman works in many mediums, but is especially passionate about drawing. Rotman hopes to some day work in the exhibits department of a science and natural history museum. She recently interned at The Field Museum of Natural History in Chicago, where she gained experience creating models and working on dioramas, and gained an overall understanding of the realities of her chosen career path.
In order to offset her college expenses, Rotman worked three jobs this past summer. One of these jobs involved teaching art classes through the York Parks and Recreation Department to children.
The York Art Association feels confident that it has successfully chosen a candidate that Letitia Moore would have been proud to have helped reach her educational goals.
Rotman said, "It is going to do more for me than any of them could possibly know."
Letitia Moore passed away in 2007, and named York Art Association as her primary beneficiary. The Letitia Moore Charitable Trust Scholarship was established by the York Art Association in 2009. The scholarship honors Moore's wish to provide tuition scholarships to deserving art, and/or art history students.
Moore was an artist herself and a member of YAA. Recipients of the Letitia Moore Charitable Trust Scholarship must have completed one year at an accredited college or university, be enrolled in a studio art, or art history program, and have a grade-point average of at least 3.0.

description.hltext_display: City can boost revenue by selling landfill gas
description.content:
Recently, you reported that Greensboro City Council is giving away landfill gas to subsidize the International Textile Group.
One council member stated that no viable alternatives are available. However, many municipalities are turning trash into energy to benefit their local citizens and economies.
One example is Jackson County, N.C., a small mountainous area that was lauded by the Environmental Protection Agency for its program. Jackson County is converting methane to power a business park that houses greenhouses, blacksmiths and other viable entities.
I urge City Council members, appropriate city staff and citizens, to visit jcgep.org to learn about successful, economically advantageous strategies that are in place in local areas with far fewer resources than our city and county.
Why should the city continue to subsidize one local industry when it could use this resource to benefit the city as a whole?

description.hltext_display: 文筱芮不惧原唱苏见信 清唱《海阔天空》获赞
description.content:
苏见信的“咪咕和Ta的朋友”歌友会千呼万唤始出来，在众多歌迷的期待中于18日在青岛某大学内如期上演。90后创作美女文筱芮也作为嘉宾出现在现场，与信一起把现场气氛一次次推向高潮。
歌友会现场，文筱芮不仅演唱了自己新专辑中的两首原创《那个》和《快乐的伤心情歌》，还清唱了前辈信的《海阔天空》，台下歌迷反响十分热烈。这不是筱芮第一次接触摇滚，在之前参加比赛的时候她也曾多次挑战摇滚风，不一样的文筱芮让歌迷们都眼前一亮。这次还有20个歌迷来到现场，并送上了为她准备的礼物，让文筱芮十分惊喜，接下来又和歌迷们进行了有趣的互动，演出也十分投入。
信为歌迷带来了收录在他的第一张SOLO专辑中的《英国的夏天》，这首温暖浪漫的英伦摇滚带动了台下歌迷的热情，让现场气氛马上火爆起来。整场歌友会在信和文筱芮一静一动的演唱中完满的落下帷幕。

3G in India: Operator Launch Strategies. The report describes data services targeted at specific market segments, provides the key to faster returns on network investments. The research provides the information on the operators that are now planning their network rollout and service strategies and discusses 3G launch strategies in India …

description.hltext_display: Les Nets dominent Memphis
description.content: Sasha Vujacic est en train de faire beaucoup de bien aux Nets. Dj prcieux lors de la victoire contre Atlanta dimanche soir, le meneur slovne, arriv il y a peu des Lakers, a inscrit 16 points en sortant du banc, lors de la victoire de New Jersey contre Memphis (101-94), pour qui c'tait plus compliqu avec un duo Gay-Randolph maladroit (11 points chacun, mais 8/29 aux tirs eux deux). Le meilleur marqueur de la rencontre aura t le pivot des Nets, Brook Lopez: 26 points. Johan Petro, lui, n'a pas jou.

description.hltext_display: Tågproblem i Västsverige
description.content:
Efter en mycket kall natt i hela landet, med -36 grader i Idre, är ett nytt område med snö på väg in över norra Götaland och Hälsingland. Kraftiga förseningar väntas i tågtrafiken i dag också. Flygtrafiken till och från London ska fungera som normalt i dag.
SMHI har utfärdat en klass 1-varning för att omkring en decimeter snö kan komma fram i Hälsingland under morgonen och förmiddagen.
Trafikverket har satt in extra resurser för att gårdagens snöproblem ska undvikas i dag. Trots det väntas kraftiga förseningar i Västsverige. På grund av växelfel kommer tågen på sträckorna Halmstad-Göteborg och Halmstad-Malmö, det vill säga Västkustbanan, att drabbas av kraftiga förseningar.
Även på sträckan Charlottenberg-Laxå är det problem med tågväxlar vilket orsakar störningar.
- Det vi har är efterdyningar av gårdagens stora problem med växelfel, säger Tommy Andersson på SJ:s pressjour. - En del tåg har hamnat på fel plats i omloppet, kan man säga.
Ett 20-tal tåg i Mälardalen kommer att ersättas av buss och en del passagerare har blivit ombokade till andra avgångar.
Flygtrafiken till och från London ska återupptas i nära nog normal omfattning i dag.
- Som det ser ut just nu så har vi ställt in en Londontur från Stockholm i eftermiddag och från Göteborg ställer vi in en tur och retur till London. Resten hoppas vi verkligen att vi ska kunna få i väg, säger SAS informationschef Elisabeth Manzi.
Situationen i London är fortfarande kaosartad, SAS har närmare 6 000 svenskar strandade där.
För att få hem så många som möjligt planerar SAS att byta till större flygplan.
- Men det är svårt att sitta och lova något, det blir en så skör situation när så många är drabbade. Men nu håller vi tummarna, för vi behöver verkligen lätta på trycket. - Självklart är vårt mål att alla ska få fira jul hemma. Vi gör allt för att få hem alla, säger Elisabeth Manzi.
SAS har kallat in extra personal för att svara på frågor och sköta ombokningar för alla de som drabbats, men väntetiderna har varit mycket långa.
- Vi hoppas på förståelse, men de har förstås behövt utrusta sig med en stor portion tålamod.
Snöröjningen på Londonflygplatsen Heathrow har fått mycket hård kritik.
- Jag är inte någon expert på snöröjning men vi kan ju konstatera att de inte har klarat av att leverera det vi köper, nämligen möjligheten att kunna flyga till den flygplatsen. De har uppenbarligen inte klarat att leva upp till de önskvärda nivåerna, säger Elisabeth Manzi.
När det gäller Paris, Amsterdam och Frankfurt är man i stort sett i kapp med strandade passagerare eftersom trafiken har kunnat upprätthållas, om än med förseningar och inställda flyg.

description.hltext_display: 东来东往“丽水风”曝光 公司称并未正式发布
description.content:
曾经在“璀璨丽水 瓯江情”群星演唱会上未发行就首度开唱的东来东往最新歌曲《丽水风》，近期突现网络，被不少的网友转载试听，而从并不完全的歌曲信息中可以看出，这次并不是由东来东往所属唱片公司美力音乐正式发布版本，在新专辑屡屡传出消息的同时却发生歌曲意外流传网络，似乎成为了很多歌手难以避免的一环。
在11月底浙江丽水的演唱会中，东来东往首唱了这首献给家乡的歌曲《丽水风》，这首中国风的歌曲不仅充满了东东对家乡的热爱，也是对自己童年回忆的追溯。由于是收录在尚未发行的新专辑中，这让不少当晚并不能来到现场的歌迷即惊喜又遗憾，纷纷希望能早日让全国的歌迷都听到这首新歌，美力音乐也曾透露会在近期发布正式版本。而近期，网络上突然出现了不少关于《丽水风》的试听链接，几日内便有了上网条相关网页，但仅仅是有试听和歌词，并没有完整的歌曲制作名单和工作人员信息，可见并不是由所属公司正式发布。
经联络美力音乐方面，得到工作人员回复消息，公司确实并没有正式发布这首歌曲，不过这次的流传事件也并不是被人盗发，而是东东在自己的微博上首发而流传出去的。在丽水的演唱会后，电视台播放了当晚的晚会，有观众录制下来发布到了网络上，音质和画面都很粗糙，东东不想让歌迷为了能抢先听到新歌而去选择并不清晰的音质，所以在自己的微博上发布了完整版的歌曲，让大家能抢先听到最终的完美音质。公司会考虑稍后发布官方正式版，即时将可以在所有的音乐门户网站上听到这首东东唱给家乡的歌曲。

description.hltext_display: Barcelona mal torlos
description.content:
Der FC Barcelona, der sonst im bisherigen Saisonverlauf Tore ohne Ende erziehlt hat, kam im spanischen Pokal nur zu einem torlosen Remis, während auch das einzige Spiel der französischen Liga mit einem Unentschieden endete.
Gerard Piqué bestraft den Torpfosten nach einer verpassten Chance ©
Veröffentlicht: Dienstag, 21. Dezember 2010, 21.30MEZ Der FC Barcelona, der sonst im bisherigen Saisonverlauf Tore ohne Ende erziehlt hat, kam im spanischen Pokal nur zu einem torlosen Remis, während auch das einzige Spiel der französischen Liga mit einem Unentschieden endete.
Das 0:0 im Hinspiel des Achtelfinales der Copa del Rey gegen den Athletic Club war erst das zweite Mal in dieser Saison, dass dem FC Barcelona kein Tor gelang.
Hércules CF ist die einzige Mannschaft, die am 11. September mit 2:0 gegen die Elf von Josep Guardiola gewinnen konnte, aber der spanische Meister hatte in allen anderen 22 Spielen auf nationaler und europäischer Bühne mindestens ein Tor erzielt, bevor es gegen die resolut verteidigenden Mannen aus Bilbao ging. Bojan Krkić, Andrés Iniesta, Lionel Messi und David Villa hatten im Camp Nou allesamt Chancen zu verzeichnen, doch Gorka Iraizoz konnte den Basken das Unentschieden retten, und als auch Gerard Piqué kurz vor Schluss am Tor vorbeizielte, war es klar, dass es einfach nicht der Abend des FC Barcelona war.
Zweitligist Córdoba CF erreichte zu Hause ein 1:1 gegen RC Deportivo La Coruña, während Villarreal CF im Abendspiel 0:0 gegen Valencia CF spielte. Juan Mata traf kurz nach der Pause mit einem Volley nur den Pfosten, während die Elf von Unai Emery auch andere Großchancen liegen ließ.
Das einzige französische Ligaspiel am Dienstagabend endete mit einem torlosen Unentschieden zwischen dem FC Lorient und dem ebenfalls im Mittelfeld beheimateten Montpellier Hérault SC. Die Gastgeber hatten mehr vom Spiel, aber die Mannschaft von Christian Gourcuff konnte trotz Unterzahl in den letzten 17 Minuten - Mapou Yanga-M'Biwa musste vorzeitig vom Feld - das Remis über die Zeit retten.

description.hltext_display: Прямые трансляции матчей КХЛ на 22 декабря
description.content: В среду, 22 декабря, любителям хоккея будут предложены прямые видеотрансляции следующих матчей КХЛ. . Начало в 16:00. . Начало в 16:00. . Начало в 17:00. . Начало в 17:00. . Начало в 20:00. . Начало в 20:30. Стоимость просмотра одного матча в прямом эфире составит две монеты (20 рублей) при оплате через "Кошелёк" и 35 рублей при оплате с помощью SMS. Для просмотра матчей необходимо: — зарегистрироваться на сайте "Фанат.ру" — http://www.fanat.ru/register; — активировать "Кошелёк", указав платёжный пароль через профиль "Фанат.ру"; — пополнить "Кошелёк", купив монеты любым из пяти способов, и приобрести "билет" на просмотр выбранного матча через "Магазин". В настоящее время пополнить "Кошелёк" можно следующими способами: платёжный терминал; банковская карта VISA или MasterCard; банковский платёж; денежный перевод через систему CONTACT; электронные деньги.

description.hltext_display: 《Merry Christmas goodbye for you》：送给圣诞节落单之人的最好礼物
description.content:
如果说“孤单的人最怕过节”，那么“无色素女声”格杨演唱的《Merry Christmas goodbye for you》这首歌将这种圣诞节的孤单情节演绎的淋漓尽致。干净无暇的声音、缓缓流动的旋律，这首歌就像是圣诞节前的一被冰镇鸡尾酒，挑起了所有落单的人落寞的心绪。因此被某门户网站的圣诞歌曲专题中，被评为“送给圣诞节落单之人的最好礼物”。
作为EQ唱片今年全力打造的女歌手，格杨不仅外形甜美气质纯净，声音也像泉水一般温婉动人。在这首单曲的MV中，格杨以简单素雅的造型示人，低吟浅唱之处尽显缱绻动人，唯美演绎圣诞节落寞孤寂的情绪。也是因为这首歌太过贴切很多人现在的情绪，所以推出后受到很多人的追捧，就连不慎泄露的歌曲小样，也被赞好听。这首圣诞单曲推出不久，就在各大电台位于榜单前列，与尚雯婕等一众大牌艺人“分食”榜单荣耀。
对于这首单曲，格杨表示道出了自己的心情故事，她说她用最简单的唱法，不纠正唱腔、不修饰咬字，直接唱出圣诞节孤单的节日情节，格杨表示，这首歌深深感动了她，因为这也曾是她所经历过的心境，相信也是每对分手后的恋人都会有的情绪，因此，他要将这样的心情以最真诚的方式化作音符，唱进每个人的心。把它作为一份礼物，送给所有圣诞节落单的人。

description.hltext_display: Massive fire breaks out in thread...
description.content:
Chandigarh: A massive fire broke out in a thread factory complex near Samana town in Punjab on Tuesday morning, destroying goods and equipment worth crores of rupees, police said. No casualties were reported.
"The fire brigade authorities were informed immediately after the fire was first seen, but they came nearly two hours later. By then, the fire had spread through the factory, especially in the area where the raw material was kept," alleged an official at the Sarbat Thread Factory.
Fire brigade personnel were still trying to control the blaze, seven hours after it started in the wee hours Tuesday.
"Despite Samana town having many industries, the fire brigade authorities were not geared to face such an eventuality," the company official said.
The loss due to the fire was expected to be over R 10 crore ( R 100 million).
Fire engines were called from Samana, about 100 km from here, and nearby towns of Malerkotla, Sangrur and Barnala.
A similar fire in the raw material godown of leading towel manufacturer Trident Group in Barnala town on December 2 had led to a loss of over Rs15 crore.

entity.property: official at the Sarbat Thread Factory

description.hltext_display: Spirit of giving thrives in York
description.author: Susan Morse
description.content:
The need is greater this year, but so is the generosity.
The Food Pantry and York Police Department have seen an increase in requests for food and toys this holiday season. The new York Community Family Services program, Gifts 4 Kids, has received numerous requests for help its first season, said Lorna Ryan, who heads York Community Service Association, the umbrella organization for Family Services, the thrift store and food pantry.
Residents have "stepped up" to fill the need, according to those interviewed.
Enough toys, food and donations have been dropped off at the York Community Food Pantry, for the York Police Department's Giving Tree and York Family Services to fill holiday baskets and children's wish lists this Christmas.
This is the first year Ryan has become involved in collecting toy donations through Gifts 4 Kids.
Recently, a mother walked into the York Thrift Shop on Route 1 crying, saying she didn't know what she was going to do about Christmas, recalled Ryan. Ryan gave her a large bag, and told her to help herself to the toys spilling out of her small office.
"The outpouring of support is huge," said Ryan on Wednesday, Dec. 15. "We've had donations from bicycles to American Girl dolls, all kinds of toys and things for teens. Enough to fill the Christmas list. The outpouring from the community (will) make a child's Christmas brighter."
Ryan asked residents for financial support to sponsor 35 families, and also requested new, unwrapped gifts.
It was almost shocking how the community responded, she said. "All of a sudden the calls were coming in," she said. "And then the calls were coming in from families needing help."
Businesses and organizations have also been raising funds, said Ryan. For instance, People's United Bank, formerly Ocean Bank, raised money and gift donations for the York High School Interact Club, a Rotary service organization, for its support of the Toys for Teens Program. The money has gone toward gift cards for teens, said Ryan, an age group not served as well as younger children when it comes to toy donations.
The York High School boys hockey team members asked fans to bring an unwrapped toy to their home opener game Wednesday, Dec. 15, at the Dover Ice Arena in Dover, N.H. The toys were donated to the Gifts 4 Kids program.
Because this is the program's first year, Ryan has no way to compare the need in the community this year to last. She is seeing families who are living paycheck to paycheck, she said, who have no money leftover to buy gifts.
Some have lost their homes and may be living with their parents, she said. In some cases, it's the grandparents, living on Social Security income, who are raising the children and need the help.
Food Pantry Director Pat Whalen is definitely seeing an increase in the number of families who are coming in this year, about 50 to 56 people per week compared to 40 or 42 per week in 2009.
The number of food baskets going out to families for Thanksgiving and Christmas remains about the same as last year, said Whalen.
Volunteers put together 102 food baskets this Thanksgiving. They expect to make the same number for Christmas dinner for York families. Anyone may sign up for a holiday food basket.
Starting around 4 p.m. Sunday, Dec. 19, volunteers stuffed empty wine boxes, gathered from Hannaford, with canned food and other nonperishable items. Then, early Monday morning, Dec. 20, they filled the boxes with fresh turkeys, hams, vegetables, fruit, pies and rolls for distribution from St. Christopher Church around 11 a.m. Monday.
Volunteers made deliveries to seniors and others who couldn't come in to pick up the boxes.
There's plenty of food to fill the baskets, said Whalen, who is happy to have leftovers after the holidays, when donations traditionally drop. For instance, the Food Pantry received 980 Hannaford food boxes this year, compared to 400 last year, she said. The boxes, bought for $10 by Hannaford customers, contain peanut butter, pasta, tomato sauce, cereal, soup, canned fruit and other items.
York Police Department Administrative Assistant Peggy Scamman was busy Monday and Tuesday, Dec. 20 and 21, helping to wrap the toys that had come into the station through the York Police Association's Giving Tree.
All of the request tags from the tree are being filled, said Scamman. There are 24 families needing help this year, compared to an estimated 15 last year.
"I think people in general know how difficult it's been this year, making ends meet with regular expenses, let alone something extra," said Scamman.
In addition, York Hospital staff, in partnership with area service agencies, helped to ensure 50 area families and seniors, more than 179 individuals, had gifts to open this holiday season, according to a statement from hospital spokesman Dawn Fernald, released Monday, Dec. 20. Working with the wish lists provided by local Head Start programs, senior centers, elementary schools, Toys for Tots and the Girl Scouts, more than 42 hospital teams filled the a hallway at the Heart Health Institute on Long Sands Raod with presents and packages. Area families arrived Friday, Dec. 17, to pick up the gifts in preparation for Christmas week.

description.hltext_display: 2011 станет годом бурного развития технологии NFC
description.content:
Результаты нового исследование iSuppli свидетельствует о том, что технология NFC в 2011 году будет переживать "бурное распространение". Стоит напомнить, что первую модель мобильного телефона с поддержкой NFC выпустила в 2005 году компания Nokia, а последней нашумевшей новинкой в этой сфере стал смартфон Nexus S от Google.
Как известно, NFC - это технологии беспроводной высокочастотной связи малого радиуса действия, благодаря которой с помощью смартфонов пользователи могут мгновенно совершать финансовые транзакции. По мнению некоторых аналитиков, подобные денежные операции гораздо безопаснее, чем платежи, осуществляемые с помощью кредитных карт.
По мнению старшего директора и главного аналитика iSuppli, Джагдиш Ребелло (Jagdish Rebello), благодаря данной технологии произойдет настоящая революция в сфере мобильных платежей. "Только представьте, для того, чтобы оплатить за проезд в автобусе, купить билеты на самолет или расплатиться за покупки кредитной картой, нужно будет просто поднести свой мобильный телефон к беспроводному терминалу,"- говорит специалист.
Согласно прогнозу, в 2011 году в мире будет поставлено около 80 миллионов смартфонов с поддержкой NFC. К 2013 году показатели мировых поставок подобных аппаратов достигнут уже 156 миллионов, а еще через год - более 220 миллионов.

description.hltext_display: Traditionelle Berufswahl: Nur wenige Frauen haben Männerjobs – und umgekehrt
description.content:
Nur wenige Frauen haben Männerjobs – und umgekehrt
Maurer sind meistens Männer, Erzieher mehrheitlich Frauen: An der traditionellen Berufswahl hat sich trotz Emanzipation nicht viel geändert.
Allen Bemühungen um die Gleichberechtigung zum Trotz wählen die meisten ihren Beruf weiterhin nach eher traditionellen Vorstellungen aus. Der Anteil der Frauen an allen Erwerbstätigen ist hierzulande von 2001 bis 2009 zwar um 4,2 Prozentpunkte auf 45,8 Prozent gestiegen, wie das Statistische Bundesamt mitteilte. Die von Frauen und Männern bevorzugt ausgeübten Berufen dagegen haben sich demnach in dieser Zeit nur wenig verändert.
Deutschlands Chefinnen
In der Führung der 500 größten Unternehmen in Deutschland befinden sich nur 49 Frauen. Dies entspricht gerade einmal rund 2,4 % aller Vorstands- und Geschäftsführungspositionen in den Unternehmen.
Im Sommer 2009 nahmen 32 oder 65 % von ihnen an einer Umfrage der Führungskräfte-Agentur Odgers Berndtson zum Thema „Deutschlands Chefinnen – Wie Frauen es an die Unternehmensspitze schaffen" teil. Hier die wesentlichen Ergebnisse:
Die Begeisterung für ihre berufliche Aufgabe (94 %) und ihr persönlicher Ehrgeiz (63 %) waren die entscheidenden Motivatoren für die Karriere von Deutschlands Chefinnen. Macht (25 %) sowie Geld und Status (13 %) wurden deutlich seltener genannt.
Als eine der wichtigsten Eigenschaften, die sie persönlich am meisten für die Ausübung ihrer derzeitigen Führungsposition qualifizieren, nennen Deutschlands Chefinnen ihr Einfühlungsvermögen und ihre Kommunikationsstärke.
Die Mehrheit von Deutschlands Chefinnen (72 %) blieb ihrer Branche im Verlauf ihrer Karriere treu. 63 % wurden aus dem eigenen Unternehmen für ihre derzeitige Top-Führungsposition rekrutiert.
Keine der befragten Frauen bezeichnete die schwierige Vereinbarkeit von Familie und Beruf als Karrierehemmnis. Dabei sind 81 % der Chefinnen verheiratet oder leben in einer festen Lebensgemeinschaft, 44 % der Frauen haben Kinder.
44 % der Top-Managerinnen befürworten die Einführung einer gesetzlichen Frauenquote. Die übrigen Frauen sehen zwar die Gefahr, als Quotenfrau abqualifiziert zu werden, dennoch räumen alle Befragten ein, dass eine gesetzliche Regelung temporär hilfreich wäre, um den Frauenanteil in deutschen Führungsgremien spürbar zu erhöhen.
88 % der Teilnehmerinnen der Studie verfügen über einen akademischen Abschluss. Nur vier Frauen begannen ihre berufliche Entwicklung mit einer Fachausbildung, von denen eine später ein berufsbegleitendes Fachstudium absolvierte.
Die Studienabschlüsse von Deutschlands Chefinnen verteilen sich im Wesentlichen auf drei Fachrichtungen: An erster Stelle, mit fast 60 %, stehen die Wirtschaftswissenschaften, auf Rang zwei die Natur- und Ingenieurwissenschaften, in denen insgesamt 25 % der Frauen ihren Abschluss machten. Das Studium der Rechtswissenschaften spielt mit nur 11 % der Studienabschlüsse eher eine untergeordnete Rolle.
Über eine Promotion verfügt etwas mehr als ein Drittel der akademisch ausgebildeten Frauen (36 %). Vier Wirtschaftswissenschaftlerinnen, drei Naturwissenschaftlerinnen und alle drei Juristinnen haben einen Doktortitel erworben. 18 % der befragten Frauen mit Studienabschluss haben ihren akademischen Grad durch eine postgraduierte Ausbildung aufgewertet.
Berufliche Auslandserfahrung – hier sind Auslandsstudien oder –praktika nicht berücksichtigt – hat die Hälfte der befragten Frauen während ihres beruflichen Werdegangs gesammelt.
50 % der Studienteilnehmerinnen empfanden den letzten Karriereschritt als schwieriger im Vergleich zu den vorherigen. Die betroffenen Frauen gaben an, dass sie an diesem Punkt ihrer Karriere häufig mit Vorbehalten gegenüber einer weiblichen Führungspersönlichkeit konfrontiert wurden.
Für 63% der Frauen hatte das Erbringen überdurchschnittlicher Leistungen und die Demonstration ihrer fachlichen Kompetenz oberste Priorität. Dadurch verschafften sie sich Akzeptanz auf allen Ebenen.
Zu allererst fordern die Chefinnen berufstätige Frauen auf, ehrlich zu sich selbst zu sein und ihre eigenen Talente, Fähigkeiten und Karriereziele realistisch einzuschätzen. Fragen wie zum Beispiel «wie wichtig ist für mich beruflicher Erfolg», «welche Opfer bin ich bereit, dafür zu bringen», sollten klar und aufrichtig beantwortet werden.
Netzwerke zielgerichtet als Karrieresprungbrett zu nutzen, sich Aufträge oder Positionen auf diesem Weg zu verschaffen, fällt den meisten Frauen schwer. Dies wird vielfach als Vetternwirtschaft empfunden – Frauen wollen es aber durch eigene Leistung ins Top-Management schaffen. Stand: Juni 2009
Noch immer sind Berufe wie Maurer, Elektriker oder Berufskraftfahrer fast ausschließlich männlich besetzt, Kosmetiker, Erzieher oder Altenpfleger hingegen sind Berufe, die fast nur von Frauen ausgeübt werden. Laut Statistik waren im vergangenen Jahr 49 Prozent der Männer und 36 Prozent der Frauen in Berufen tätig, die zu über 80 Prozent von Menschen des eigenen Geschlechts ausgeübt wurden.
Foto: Infografik WELT ONLINE Emanzipation
Die Veränderung im Vergleich zum Jahr 2000 war demnach gering: Damals hatten laut Statistik 52 Prozent der Männer und 34 Prozent der Frauen einen Beruf, der vom jeweils eigenen Geschlecht dominiert wurde. Nur in wenigen Berufen, etwa bei Versicherungs- oder Bankkaufleuten, waren im vergangenen Jahr annähernd gleich viele Männer wie Frauen beschäftigt. Auch bei den jüngeren Berufstätigen stieg der Frauenanteil in den vergangenen Jahren laut Statistik nur in wenigen Berufsgruppen an. Es waren solche, die einen Hochschulabschluss erfordern: Ärzte, Rechtsanwälte oder Wirtschaftswissenschaftler. Männer zeigten dagegen laut Statistik kaum Neigungen, stärker in von Frauen dominierte Berufsfelder vorzudringen.
1 von 10
Die mächtigsten Frauen der Welt

description.hltext_display: 1,150 will work to build on Hemlock plant in Clarksville
description.content:
CLARKSVILLE, Tenn. Officials say 1,150 workers are being employed to build a polysilicon plant in Clarksville, and that number is expected to increase. The $1.2 billion Hemlock Semiconductor facility is scheduled to be finished in 2012, with production expected to start later that year.
Meanwhile, officials say the construction work force at the site is expected to peak at 1,500 by the middle of next year.
Hemlock has also started a training program for production operators.
Michigan-based Hemlock Semiconductor is a joint venture between Dow Corning Corp. and two Japanese companies, Shin-Etsu Handotai Co. and Mitsubishi Materials Corp.
Polysilicon is a raw material used to make solar cells and semiconductor devices.

description.hltext_display: 盛大员工发展报告披露：2010年平均薪资涨幅20%
description.author: dlgboy
description.content:
BiaNews 12月22日消息 盛大网络今日公开发布了2010年第三季度《员工发展报告》，该报告显示，盛大员工2010年平均薪资涨幅接近20%，继续保持行业高水平。另据咨询公司韬锐惠悦2010年度薪酬报告显示，高科技行业2010年平均涨薪比例为8.2%。
盛大网络透露，其“游戏式管理”用游戏中增加经验值的方式令员工自动获得晋级加薪，一年有四次以上的加薪机会。2009年7月至2010年7月，盛大员工仅凭经验值增加获得的平均薪资涨幅已达14.6%，大大高于行业平均水平。
在此基础上，为了兑现盛大对员工“让每个员工薪酬增长跑赢CPI”的承诺，公司于今年7月为全体员工普涨薪资；同时，为了增强核心岗位市场竞争力，公司还对重点岗位进行了薪酬竞争力调整，以确保 “最高的工资给最优秀的人才”。至此，盛大员工2010年平均薪资涨幅近20%，继续保持行业高水平。
《员工发展报告》就盛大网络规范和完善企业管理体系和制度，在人才引进、培养与发展等工作上继续取得进展做了详细介绍，揭示了盛大对企业软性环境的塑造，旨在为外界全方位了解盛大的人才战略和人才培养提供一个直观的窗口。据了解，今后盛大将定期发布该报告。
全文可在盛大官网 http://snda.com/cn/culture/staffreport.html下载

description.hltext_display: New move to save the girl child
description.content:
Ludhiana: In yet another attempt to check cases of female foeticide in the state, the government has decided to come up with some new initiatives to curb the menace.
According to reports, the government is planning to make the Form-F, the essential document for registration of ultrasound clinics, to make the tracking of these clinics more effective and curb cases of pre-natal sex determination.
Talking to Bhaskar, state Health and Family Welfare Director Dr. Ashok Nayyer said that the new system would ensure a quick and effective track on the clinics rather than the earlier manual system which used to take more than 15 days to complete the process.
He said a proposal in this regard is likely to be put forward in January for approval from the PNDT Advisory Committee followed by the final nod of the government.
Nayyer added that the department would also follow all ultrasound cases to ensure that no pre-natal sex determination was done by the patient further.
The new system, when implemented, will make it mandatory for all ultrasound clinics to submit a copy of all tests conducted by them to the government.

description.hltext_display: Slow-cooked meat worth the wait
description.content:
Hear the phrase "falling off the bone" and, if you are a meat-eater, you start salivating. You think of short ribs, lamb shanks, osso bucco, coq au vin ? all the spectacular stews and braises that make you want to belly up to the table and dig in. All the dishes in which the meat is fork-tender, melt-in-your-mouth delicious. In other words, "falling off the bone," whether or not (as in the ragout, below) there are actual bones involved.
At the holidays, cooking such dishes is not only good gastronomy; it's good for economy. Many slow-cooked dishes (with some notable exceptions, like veal shanks for osso bucco), use tougher, less expensive cuts of meat. It's good planning, too: At the holidays, a slow-cooked dish makes much more sense than a last-minute one. Plus, it can be made in advance and refrigerated or even frozen until needed. For example, the beef-ragout recipe here incorporates several shortcuts: pre-sliced mushrooms, canned cranberry sauce and canned broth. Yet it is delicious and impressive enough to serve for holiday company.
If you don't have as many recipes for slow-cooked meat dishes as you would like, the aptly named "Falling Off the Bone" by Jean Anderson (Wiley, 2010) can more than help. Here is a book crammed with luscious, meaty dishes ? including a number of hearty soups ? that will get you through the holidays and beyond. Anderson, a James Beard Award-winning cookbook author, draws inspiration from the flavors of Sweden, the United Kingdom, France, Italy, Germany, Hungary, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, China, Latin and South America, as well as early American and American Indian cookery.
The best news for busy cooks is that most soups, stews and braises are best made at least a day ahead of time, to allow the flavors to meld. Added bonus: Most need only some good bread and a salad to make a warming, festive meal. Your guests will fall off their seats for meat that is "falling off the bone."
RAGOUT OF BEEF WITH CRANBERRIES AND WILD MUSHROOMS
¼ pound double-smoked or hickory-smoked slab bacon finely diced
¼ cup unsalted butter or vegetable oil
3 pounds boneless beef chuck, trimmed of excess fat and cut into 1-inch cubes
4 large peeled shallots or scallions, trimmed and coarsely chopped
2 large yellow onions, peeled and coarsely chopped
2 (8-ounce) packages sliced cremini or white mushrooms
2 small sprigs fresh thyme (preferably lemon thyme) or ½ teaspoon crumbled dried leaf thyme
1 small sprig fresh rosemary or ½ teaspoon crumbled dried leaf rosemary
2 cups dry red wine (such as a pinot noir or cabernet)
1¾ cups beef broth
1 cup canned whole cranberry sauce
½ ounce dried porcini mushrooms or chanterelles
1 teaspoon salt, or to taste
¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste
1 cup heavy (whipping) cream
Cook's note: Wondering what the difference is between stewing and braising? They both involve long, slow cooking, in the oven or on the stove top, in a pot with a tight-fitting lid. But with a stew (more commonly done on top of the stove), you use enough liquid to just cover the ingredients. With a braise (more commonly done in the oven), a much smaller amount of liquid is used. The tight-fitting lid and low temperatures are important in braising to keep liquid from evaporating.
Bring a small pot of water to a boil. Add the diced bacon, and cook for 10 minutes. Drain well, and set aside.
In a large, heavy, nonreactive Dutch oven set over medium-high heat, melt the butter until it froths and subsides. Working in batches (don't crowd the pan!), brown the beef, allowing about 10 minutes per batch. As each batch is done, transfer the meat to a bowl using a slotted spoon.
Add shallots (or scallions), onions, sliced mushrooms, the blanched bacon, thyme and rosemary to the pot, and sauté, stirring often, until lightly browned, 10 to 12 minutes.
Return the beef to the pot along with any accumulated juices. Add the wine, broth, cranberry sauce, dried mushrooms, salt and pepper, and bring to a boil. Adjust heat so liquid bubbles gently, and simmer until beef is fork-tender, two to two-and-a-half hours. At this point you can cool, cover and refrigerate the ragout for up to two days, or freeze it for up to three months. Thaw if needed, and reheat gently but thoroughly before proceeding.
Mix in cream, and simmer uncovered until liquids reduce to a nice gravy consistency; this will take about 30 minutes. Discard thyme and rosemary sprigs (if you have used them), taste for salt and pepper, and adjust as needed.
Serve hot with boiled potatoes, buttered egg noodles or spaetzle.
Yield: 6 servings
For information, go to www.marialisacalta.com.
