description.hltext_display: Staffansgården får kritik på flera punkter
description.author: Alexandra Sievers
description.content:
DELSBO/Hudiksvalls Tidning Arbetsmiljöverkets kritik handlar bland annat om stöd och handledning, instruktioner och handlingsprogram för hot och våld och riskbedömningar.
Myndigheten konstaterar att ledningen inte har försäkrat sig om att medarbetare har möjlighet att snabbt kalla på hjälp. Ett krav är att man ska ordna så att personalen har tillgång till larm i sitt arbete.
Arbetsmiljöverket kritiserar också att verksamheten inte har ordnat med särskilt stöd och handledning till medarbetarna, trots att arbetet är psykiskt påfrestande och innehåller återkommande episoder av våld och hot.
Arbetsmiljöverket påpekar också att Staffansgården inte har några etablerade rutiner för hur inträffade olycksfall, ohälsa eller allvarliga tillbud ska utredas i verksamheten. Även det ska åtgärdas.
Myndigheten konstaterar dessutom att det finns brister beträffande chefers och arbetsledares kunskaper om riskerna med de arbeten som bedrivs inom deras ansvarsområden.
Staffansgården ska senast den 1 mars 2011 ha redovisat vad de har gjort med anledning av de brister som framkommit.

description.hltext_display: Manish Tewari to visit city on...
description.content:
Ludhiana: Member of Parliament and Congress party's national spokesperson Manish Tewari will visit the city and various villages falling in the Dakha district on Thursday.
He will visit the wards and the residential areas of the city and meet the party workers.
Tewari along with several Congress leaders from the state will also thank the public for electing Congress in the biggest Panchayat Lok Sabha. He will begin his three-day tour from a village called Gure in the Dakha district.
Tewari will also listen to the complaints from the villagers and then participate in a crucial party meeting.

description.hltext_display: 超级网银试运营范围扩大
description.author: dlgboy
description.content:
央行“网上支付跨行清算系统”(俗称“超级网银”)近日陆续在长沙、杭州等第二批城市上线。此前，“超级网银”已在北京、天津、广州、深圳等首批城市试运行。据长沙、杭州等地方媒体报道，开通“超级网银”的各家银行存在态度不一、收费标准也不统一等问题，而且，从各地用户的反应来看，也出现了冷热不均的局面。“超级网银”目前处于试运营阶段，能否得到网银用户青睐，取决于其在安全、便捷以及收费等方面的“超级”表现。
“超级网银”扩大试点
“超级网银”试运营范围正逐渐扩大。中新网消息称，“超级网银”近期登陆长沙、杭州等在内的10个二批上线城市。据悉，安徽省加入“超级网银”系统已经有12家银行。今年8月30日，“超级网银”正式登陆天津、北京、广州和深圳，至今已运行超过3个月。另有消息称，在四川，“超级网银”上线时间确定在2011年1月。在湖北，原定于11月中旬上线的“超级网银”或将延后至明年初推出。
10月15日，央行支付结算司司长欧阳卫民在“网上支付跨行清算系统”建成运行新闻发布会上介绍，该系统的建成运行给消费者带来三大好处：一是提高跨行支付效率；二是实现“一站式”财富管理；三是拓展电子商务的业务范围。之前，由于缺乏适应网上支付业务特点的跨行清算平台，网上支付的优势在跨行处理时不能充分体现，无法有效满足客户的实际需求。
分析人士指出，“超级网银”开启了网络支付新时代。在运行后的一个月，共处理支付类业务72.9万笔、金额81.28亿元，处理信息类业务26.95万笔。来自中国银行广东省分行的数据显示，“超级网银”自8月30日在该行上线运行以来，客户首日成功办理支付转账业务200多笔，8月31日400多笔，随后业务量呈稳步增长态势。截至9月末，“超级网银”各项运行指标良好，客户参与积极性非常高。
试运行存隐忧
“超级网银”的推出有望让消费者享受更方便的金融服务。据央行介绍，与传统网银的“多个账户需多次登录”有所不同，“超级网银”系统将实现商业银行网银端口的连接，个人或企业可通过统一的操作界面，查询、管理在多家商业银行开立的结算账户资金，最终可实现跨行账户管理、跨行资金汇划等金融活动。目前央行对“网上支付跨行清算系统”处理支付业务的金额上限暂定为5万元。
事实上，网银受到用户越来越多的关注。根据中国金融认证中心近日发布的《2010中国电子银行调查报告》，2010年全国城镇人口中个人网银用户比例为26.9%，比2009年增长了6个百分点；全国个人网银用户中，活跃用户比例达到80.7%，比2009年增长了4个百分点；交易用户平均每月使用次数高达5.6次，高于2009年的4.8次；企业网银方面，2010年，企业网银用户比例为40.9%，与2009年相比保持稳定。
但是，“超级网银”毕竟是新事物，由于相关系统处于试运行阶段，部分银行推广力度不大，消费者对其认知度普遍不高，在一些地方暴露出使用便利性不足的问题，某些商业银行不积极，网银用户也不给力，导致“超级网银”运行总体上显得较为平淡。据了解，在实际运行过程中，出现了网银用户跨行转账体验不佳，多数网银用户并没有受到正确的引导及收费标准混乱等情况。
尤其是在安全方面，有业内专家指出，随着“超级网银”在线交易规模的扩大，由此衍生的交易安全风险也将随之提高。中新网金融频道针对“超级网银”安全问题的一项网络调查显示，51%的网友认为“超级网银”的安全性完全可以保证，毕竟是由央行开发的，相信会在系统安全性上有一定的措施；而49%的网友认为“超级网银”的安全性确实值得担忧，是从一个账号到多个账号的更大的威胁。
应注重消费者利益
“超级银行”的推出，受到影响的首先是商业银行。有分析人士表示，大银行短期内未必会对“超级网银”持欢迎态度。一旦接入“超级网银”，许多银行的网上业务就站在同一起跑线上，银行之间的竞争将加剧，而大银行的网点优势将被弱化。业内担心大银行保护会使得“超级网银”流于形式。“超级网银”不是为了平衡各方利益，而是更好地服务百姓民生。
在安全性方面，业内人士警告称，“超级网银”的安全性实际上是由接入整个系统平台中安全系数最差的那家网银所决定的，安全系数最差的那家网银就是系统中的短板，因此必须警惕“短板效应”所引发的安全隐患。
在收费方面，有报道引用央行官员的表述称，目前央行推出的“超级网银”对商业银行的收费是免费的，随着规模效益的产生，各商业银行网银收费以后也会下降。有专家表示，长期来看，网上金融业务金额将逐渐增加，这有助于降低单笔网银交易成本，消费者需支付的手续费也将有下调空间。
总之，“超级网银”在试运行阶段仍有不尽人意之处，需要在实践中不断完善和细化，这样才能为消费者带来便捷实惠的服务。正如中央财经大学中国银行业研究中心主任郭田勇所说，“超级网银”推出后将大大提高银行服务效率，降低成本，但“超级网银”的普及会有个过程。

description.hltext_display: USDA offers conservation funding to organic producers
description.content:
US agriculture deputy secretary Kathleen Merrigan has announced USDA will provide funding to help organic producers and those transitioning to organic production implement resource conservation practices on their agricultural operations.
"Increasing consumer demand for organically grown foods is providing new opportunities for small and mid-size farmers to prosper and stay competitive in today’s economy," Merrigan said. "The 2008 Farm Bill calls for this assistance, and we want to help these farmers protect the natural resources on their land and create conditions that help foster organic production."
Fiscal year (FY) 2011 marks the third year of USDA’s Organic Initiative, and up to $50 million is available this year for producers to plan and implement conservation practices that address natural resource concerns in ways that are consistent with organic production. For example, organic producers may use the funding to plant cover crops, establish integrated pest management plans, or implement nutrient management systems consistent with organic certification standards.
Eligible producers include those certified through USDA’s National Organic Program, those transitioning to certified organic production, and those who meet organic standards but are exempt from certification because their gross annual organic sales are less than $5,000. In FY 2010, NRCS obligated nearly $24 million through the Organic Initiative to help producers implement conservation practices.
Organic Initiative funding is provided through the Environmental Quality Incentives Program (EQIP), a voluntary conservation program administered by USDA’s Natural Resources Conservation Service (NRCS) that promotes agricultural production and environmental quality as compatible national goals. The 2008 Farm Bill provided for assistance specifically for organic farm operations and those converting to organic production.
Under Organic Initiative contracts, producers are paid 75% of the cost for the organic conservation measures they implement. Beginning, limited resource, and socially disadvantaged producers are paid 90%. The program provides up to $20,000 per year per person or legal entity, with a maximum total of $80,000 over six years.

description.hltext_display: Wrapped in holiday style
description.author: PATTI RACINE
description.content:
You've measured, mixed, rolled and baked your way through the last few weeks. Your finished quick breads, cookies and cakes are absolutely beautiful.
Now don't go and hide them in a covered cookie tin, under plastic wrap or in aluminum foil.
The wrapping should show off the gift. Tammy Forrester ? who is also known as The Fudge Lady ? of Udder Ideas Fudge in Wurstboro, N.Y., suggests keeping the season in mind. "Use holiday colors to make your wrapping sparkly and festive," she said.
Take a minute and think about presentation. Stephanie Reed, sales associate at American Ribbon, Craft & Fabric in Stroudsburg, said, "The gift is its own decoration."
It has a beauty all its own ? a crackle-crusted loaf of banana bread, perfectly shaped cookies, a colorfully decorated cake. Anything they're wrapped in or placed upon should enhance their beauty.
A recent chat with Reed yielded a cookie jar full of ideas for wrapping up your holiday baking.
Let's start with the wrapping. Yep, it's convenient and you've got plenty, but ditch the plastic wrap and the aluminum foil. Rolls of cellophane and cellophane bags are really the way to go.
The rolls and bags come in all different sizes, colors and patterns. It's stiff enough to stand up on its own and tough enough to be transported wherever you need to take it. Tie the package with colored string, ribbon, fancy twist-ties or short pieces of chenille stems (pipe cleaners).
"Everything looks good in paper lace," said Reed. She suggested setting a cupcake or quick bread in a paper lace doily and then wrapping it in cellophane. Gather up the edges and tie on a mini ornament and gift tag with a pretty ribbon.
Containers really make the gift stand out. A stroll through the hardware store and a little imagination can turn a galvanized pail into a snack bucket filled with munchies. Pour the chili peanuts, caramel popcorn and sunflower seeds into individual bags. Identify each one with a label decorated with vintage seed packet pictures or vintage hardware ads.
Reed and Forrester agree that you can turn just about any object into a gift container. Some of their favorites:
New, unused paint cans for popcorn balls, brownies or cookies. Canning jars are great; you can see what's inside. Decorate the lid and tie on a gift tag. Terra-cotta pots come in all sizes. Fill a bag with goodies, set it inside the pot. Use the saucer as a cover. Tie the "package" with colored twine or jute. Bake your bread in a decorative seasonal pan, cool and wrap in cellophane. If you need a little color, lay a candy cane, silk or plastic poinsettia flower on the bread before you wrap it. You could also tie a Christmas pick to the gift with ribbon instead of using a bow. Stack cookies in a glass that can later be filled with milk to enjoy with the cookies. A tea cup or coffee mug stacked with cookies and a couple of tea bags or hot cocoa packets is a great idea for co-workers. Breads, bagels and cakes can be loaded into baskets.
Forrester's picks reflect the "bite-size" nature of her candy products. These ideas work well for cookies, candy, brownies and mini muffins.
Chinese takeout boxes can be decorated with stickers or paint. Shiny gold and silver boxes present your gift like little bite-size treasures. Use a cookie cutter as a tie-on to decorate the package. They come in all kinds of sizes, shapes and colors.
Gift tags finish the presentation. Be sure that the tag matches the way you've chosen to wrap your gift, such as manila tags for rustic gifts. Tag your gifts for easy identification and to make delivery a little easier. Reed's suggestions run the gamut from cookies to cutting and pasting.
A decorated gingerbread cookie is a unique tag, Reed said. Pipe the name of the recipient on with royal icing (it gets as firm as hard candy). Hardware items look great with raffia or jute and a manila tag. Reed's favorite is a Santa ornament. Use a regular gift tag and a glue dot to make it look like Santa is holding the tag. Computer-generated tags with a modern or vintage graphic always look smart. Use a plain manila tag and spruce it up with a tiny picture cut from a Christmas card. Use a paint pen to personalize a Christmas ornament. Tie it to the package.
Gifts from your kitchen are a gift of time. When you give someone something that you've made, you are giving them a piece of yourself ? a gift that truly comes from the heart. These packaging ideas will make your gift look as special as it is.
For information, visit www.americanribbon.com or udderideasfudge.com.

event_or_fact.property: you can turn just about any object into a gift container.
The gift is its own decoration.
Use holiday colors to make your wrapping sparkly and festive
Everything looks good in paper lace
A decorated gingerbread cookie is a unique tag

description.hltext_display: NRI devotees offer 8 gold watches to...
description.content:
Amritsar: The Managing Director of the Singapore-based Thukral Group of Companies, Arvinder Singh, and Sarabjit Singh, offered 8 gold watches to the Manager of the Sri Harmandir Sahib Gurudwara, Harbans Singh Malli. The Information officers of the Gurudwara, Jasvinder Singh Jassi and Gurbachan Singh were also present.
The watches have been made by the famous company Omega and are not available for purchase in the market. It took 6 months just to prepare the golden plates which adorn the watches on the outside.
Malli said that these watches will be put at their designated locations within two-three days.

description.hltext_display: 在线支付应注意安全
description.author: dlgboy
description.content:
临近年底，又是各路商家打折促销的高峰期。与往年相比，网络购物以折扣力度更大、挑选余地更广的优势大抢商场大促风头。例如淘宝网于本月21日开始展开“全民疯抢”大促销，就引发一波热潮。对此，支付宝公司提前为用户准备了几条给力的建议，不妨有备无患。
多备几家网银通道
与线下商场购物一样，每次网购促销都会让各个环节突然紧张起来，原本宽敞的网络道路因为同时通行的人过多便会变成拥堵。据了解，一般网络购物平台均会在大促销之前做好充分的准备，以应对例如秒杀等瞬间到来的压力。但由于产业链效应，随后的网络支付以及相关的网银、物流等则可能成为阻碍。
事实上，在11月11日的淘宝商城大促上，就出现了数家网银发生拥堵导致用户付款无门的尴尬场景。“几家用户比较多的网银付款时都慢了许多，幸亏我还有另一家小银行的网银。”一位经历淘宝光棍节大促的上海用户事后在微博留言，他建议大家多准备几家网银，以防网银拥堵。而更多的网友则认为采用支付宝卡通及准备余额才是“王道”。
对于网友的经验，支付宝表示认同，并预测本次淘宝大促仍有可能出现支付环节遇阻的问题。相关负责人建议用户不妨与朋友预先尝试下大额支付的各个环节，确保网银、支付宝卡通、额度、短信确认等各个支付环节的顺畅。
卡通是不错的帮手
据淘宝网透露，本次大促有“秒团”大戏，秒团指的就是让消费者用秒杀的价格、团购的量抢购商品。
为此支付宝推出了一份秒杀宝典，重点向用户推荐了支付宝卡通支付方式。据淘宝数据显示，以往活动中70%以上的秒杀成功用户使用了支付宝卡通。而支付宝也通过测试指出，通常网友使用网银支付耗时约45秒，而卡通仅需3秒钟即可完成，时差15倍！
据了解，支付宝卡通是指用户储蓄卡或信用卡与支付宝账号绑定的一种新支付方式，签约后用户只需输入支付宝密码即可使用卡内余额，无需跳转网银，从而大大节省了支付时间，同时由于减少支付环节，其安全性也更高。
目前，工行、邮储、招行、中信、建行、农行储蓄卡，以及民生、兴业、华夏、中信、工行、建行、中兴信用卡均支持在网上开通卡通服务。更多银行则支持前往银行柜台签约办理。
防盗意识不能少
尽管抢购时心情难免有些激动，但安全不是浮云，支付宝也给所有用户给出了提醒。
支付宝表示，网购时除了要将相关的账户和密码保管好之外，在与商家沟通时谨慎接收对方发来的文件，以免因小失大中了木马病毒。此外，在进行网银付款时也要注意收款人单位信息，核实后再支付。
而经常性地进行电脑杀毒，保证上网环境的安全更是每位消费者的日常功课，马虎不得。支付宝表示网络支付安全最重要的还是使用时的安全意识，遇到疑问最好先致电支付宝进行询问。

description.hltext_display: Антициклон принесёт в Забайкалье 45-градусные морозы
description.content:
МониторингВерсия для печатиНашли ошибку в тексте?
Антициклон принесёт 23, 24, 25 декабря в Забайкалье температуры ниже 45 градусов.
Как сообщила корреспонденту ИА «Чита.Ру» 22 декабря начальник отдела метеопрогнозов Елена Затерухина, по северным районам края ожидается падение температуры ниже 50 градусов.
«Ночные температуры будут колебаться от 45 до 50 градусов мороза, дневные — от минус 25-30 градусов. В утренние часы будет туман. С 26 декабря антициклон начнёт отступать, и температура незначительно повысится - до минус 30-35 градусов ночью, 20-30 градусов мороза — днём», - сообщила Затерухина.
Пресс-служба губернатора края сообщает, что в связи с надвигающимися морозами главой региона подписано постановление о введении по региону повышенной готовности. Все оперативные службы, особенно аварийные службы на объектах ЖКХ и энергетики приведены в повышенную готовность.
В связи с резким похолоданием, власти региона обращаются к забайкальцам с просьбой ограничить длительное пребывание на улице, отложить запланированные поездки на автотранспорте на дальние расстояния.

description.hltext_display: مبادا اخلاق در پاي سياست ذبح شود
description.content:
بايد منتظر بود و همت و حميت و غيرت جامعه و نهادهاي مسئول را در عمل به اوامر ديني و بزرگان دين در تقدم قائل شدن اخلاق بر سياست و قدرت سنجيد . در انتها نيز از همه دلسوزان و دست اندرکاران عدالت خواه و حق مدار مسئلت مي کنم که با واکنش هاي به موقع و ايجاد حساسيت در حوزه هاي مختلف نگذارند اخلاق و ارزش‌ها هيچ‌گاه و تحت هيچ بهانه و عذري در پاي سياست و قدرت ذبح شود و اين خطر به‌طور مکرر مانند خوره به جان و پيکر جامعه و دولت رخنه کند.
دکتر امير دبيري مهر: پروردگار متعال در قرآن کريم و در بيان زشتي صف رذيله دروغ مي فرمايد: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَهْدِي مَنْ هُوَ كاذِبٌ كَفَّار (زمر آيه3)و ْ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لا يَهْدِي مَنْ هُوَ مُسْرِفٌ كَذَّاب‏ (غافر آيه 28) در حديث ديگري نيز آمده است : «سئل رسول اللَّه (ص) يكون المؤمن جبانا؟ قال نعم، قيل و يكون بخيلا؟ قال نعم، قيل يكون كذابا؟ قال لا!» (جامع السعادات جلد 2 صفحه 322) از پيامبر پرسيدند آيا انسان با ايمان ممكن است (گاهى) ترسو باشد فرمود: آرى، باز پرسيدند آيا ممكن است (احيانا) بخيل باشد فرمود: آرى، پرسيدند آيا ممكن است كذاب و دروغگو باشد؟ فرمود نه ! در حديثى ديگر از امام باقر( ع) مى‏خوانيم: ان اللَّه عز و جل جعل للشر اقفالا، و جعل مفاتيح تلك الاقفال الشراب، و الكذب شر من الشراب» »( اصول كافى جلد 2 صفحه 254)خداوند متعال براى شر و بدى، قفلهايى قرار داده و كليد آن قفلها شراب است (چرا كه مانع اصلى زشتي‌ها و بدي‌ها عقل است و مشروبات الكلى عقل را از كار مى‏اندازد) سپس اضافه فرمود: «دروغ از شراب هم بدتر است.‌» امام حسن عسكرى نيز مى‏فرمايند: «جعلت الخبائث كلها فى بيت و جعل مفتاحها الكذب»(همان صفحه233) تمام پليدي‌ها در اتاقى قرار داده شده، و كليد آن دروغ است . مي توان به اين فهرست صدها دليل عقلي و نقلي ديگر در مذمت و نکوهش دروغ اضافه کرد و مي توان دهها برگ در تحليل پيامدهاي شوم دروغ و دروغگويي به اين سياهه افزود و نسبت و ارتباط اين رذيلت را با فروپاشي تدريجي اخلاق در جامعه تبيين کرد چنانکه ديگران کرده اند و نتيجه گرفت که دين قويا همه آحاد جامعه را از دروغگويي منع مي کند و در اين نهي و ممانعت اخلاقي ، دست اندرکاران و ...
مسئولان به جهت جايگاه و موقعيتي که دارند بيشتر مورد خطاب دين هستند. اگر اين فرض را صحيح بپنداريم ، شهروندان انتظار دارند مسئولان و کارگزاران کشور در هر مرتبه و مقامي که هستند هيچ‌گاه و به هيچ قيمتي و تحت سايه هيچ مصلحتي مرزهاي اخلاقي را نشکنند و در پايبندي به آموزه هاي ديني و اخلاقي پيشگام ديگر اقشار جامعه باشند . اهميت پاک سيرتي و متقي بودن مسئولان و کارگزاران در نظام اسلامي به گونه اي است که در قرائتي مشهور از نظريه ولايت فقيه شان وجوب حکومت اسلامي حول ولايت فقيه پاسداري از دين و ارزش‌هاي اخلاقي منبعث از دين است و اگر اين هدف فراموش شود خبر از انحرافي بزرگ در جامعه و حکومت مي دهد و اين مهم در گفتمان امام خميني (ره ) و رهبرفرزانه انقلاب از برجستگي و وضوح خاصي برخوردار است و بحمدالله نظام اسلامي در مسير پايبندي به اين رکن رکين هزينه هاي زيادي را در حوزه داخلي و خارجي في سبيل الله متحمل شده ولي به جهت بنيادين بودن نقش دين واخلاق در سياست ورزي اسلامي ذره اي تسامح در آن جايز نيست .به عبارتي عمل و پايبندي به ارزش‌ها هرچند در گفتمان ليبرالي متضمن پرداخت هزينه هايي است ولي در گفتمان اسلام سياسي و انقلاب اسلامي عين فايده و منفعت است زيرا رضاي خداوند متعال و منطقا رضايت مومنان را در پي دارد.اين موضع سال‌هاست مورد تاکيد دلسوزان کشور و انقلاب و نظام است و در قلب تک تک شهروندان موج مي زند که مبادا روزي به خاطر سياست و حفظ قدرت ارزش‌ها را زير پا بگذاريم و حدود و احکام الهي را زيرپا بگذاريم. اما متاسفانه افرادي در عمل بارفتار‌هاي غير ارزشي و غير اخلاقي به اين مطالبه به حق نظام و جامعه اسلامي خود دهن کژي مي کنند و از اين تاسف بار تر زشتي کار خود را کم جلوه داده و از آن تاسف بار تر اينکه جامعه و نهادهاي مسئول نيز واکنش مناسب به اين کژروي‌ها نشان نمي دهند.
با کمال تاسف نمونه از اين دست زياد است ولي آخرين آن ماجراي عزل منوچهر متکي وزير امور خارجه کشور است و ادعاي معاون اول رئيس جمهور درخصوص اطلاع جناب متکي از عزل خود قبل از سفر به سنگال از يک سو و تکذيب ادعاي آقاي رحيمي ازسوي آقاي متکي از سوي ديگرو تاييد و تکذيب هاي مکرر و حواشي آن که همچنان ادامه داردو منطقا محال است که همه اطراف اين ماجرا راستگو باشند و درپشت اين بگو مگوها صداي انحراف از ارزش‌ها به گوش مي آيد.البته ما در اينجا هيچ يک از طرفين را به‌طور مشخص مورد اتهام قرارنمي دهيم ولي از موضع دفاع از اخلاق و ارزش‌ها و اعتقاد به اخلاق سياسي اصل دروغگويي را با شهامت و صراحت مورد مذمت و نکوهش قرار مي دهيم و خواستار پايان دادن به اين رويه غلط و اتخاذ موضعي صادقانه از طرفين و کاهش چنين رفتارهايي در کشور هستيم . امروز جامعه به‌ويژه نسل جوان شاهد اين ادعاها و تکذيبيه هاي مکرر است و چون اين رفتارها مبناي صحيح و قابل دفاعي ندارد شهروندان قضاوت‌هاي ناخواسته اي از پيوند سياست و اخلاق در کشور مي کنند که در راستاي اهداف متعالي انقلاب و نظام اسلامي نيست .شهروندان و مردم عزيز کشورمان هر از چندگاهي از طريق رسانه ها مي بيينند و مي شنوند و مي خوانند که مسئولان ديگر کشور ها که ادعاي دينداري و پايبندي به ارزش‌هاي ديني نيز ندارند فقط به خاطر يک دروغ وبراي فرار از شرم اين رفتار زشت استعفا مي دهند زيرا در امانت واگذار شده از سوي مردم خيانت کرده و خود را شايسته زمامداري و مسئوليت نمي دانند ولي متاسفانه در کشور اسلامي ما برخي از مديران به راحتي دروغ مي‌گويند واز رفتارهاو تصميم هاي اشتباه خود عذر‌خواهي نمي‌کنند و نه وجدان و افکار عمومي حساسيت لازم را در قبال اين انحراف دارد و نه نهادهايي براي رسيدگي قانوني به اين معضل اخلاقي دست به کار مي‌شوند .چه اشکالي دارد در اين مساله نيز مدعي العموم وارد عمل شود و براي رسوا و سيه روي نمودن آنانکه در قلب‌شان غش و ريا وجود دارد و با هدف صيانت از مرزهاي اخلاقي جامعه ، حقيقت را با تحقيق و داوري روشن سازد . به نظر مي رسد ورود نهادهاي مسئول از جمله مدعي‌العموم در اين موضوعات مي تواند رويه نويني باشد که هم حساسيت نظام اسلامي را در قبال حفظ ارزش‌هاي اخلاقي و ديني در سطح مسئولان بروز مي دهد که خود موجب اعتماد بيشتر مردم به نظام مي گردد و هم نقشي بازدارنده در مسئولان و کارگزاران در سطوح مختلف در پرهيز از انحراف از مسير راستگويي و صداقت د ر موارد جزيي وکلي ايجاد مي کند.بايد منتظر بود و همت و حميت و غيرت جامعه و نهادهاي مسئول را در عمل به اوامر ديني و بزرگان دين در تقدم قائل شدن اخلاق بر سياست و قدرت سنجيد . در انتها نيز از همه دلسوزان و دست اندرکاران عدالت خواه و حق مدار مسئلت مي کنم که با واکنش هاي به موقع و ايجاد حساسيت در حوزه هاي مختلف نگذارند اخلاق و ارزش‌ها هيچ‌گاه و تحت هيچ بهانه و عذري در پاي سياست و قدرت ذبح شود و اين خطر به‌طور مکرر مانند خوره به جان و پيکر جامعه و دولت رخنه کند.
هرگز چنين مباد ان شاءالله تعالي.

description.hltext_display: Durant, Thunder beat reeling Bobcats 99-81
description.content:
CHARLOTTE Kevin Durant scored 32 points and the Oklahoma City Thunder overcame a poor shooting night by dominating the fourth quarter in a 99-81 victory over the reeling Charlotte Bobcats on Tuesday night.
The Thunder quickly erased a 69-68 deficit entering the final period with a 25-3 run full of dunks and transition buckets off Charlotte turnovers. The Bobcats missed their first 11 shots, threw the ball away five times and didn't get their first field goal of the quarter until 2:52 remained, producing sarcastic cheers.
Durant hit 14-of-16 free throws and added seven rebounds. Russell Westbrook scored 15 points, James Harden added 13 and Jeff Green scored nine of his 12 points in the fourth, when the Thunder outscored Charlotte 31-12.
Oklahoma City overcame 44 percent shooting by holding the Bobcats to 40 percent from the field. It was a much better defensive effort than in Sunday's 113-110 home loss to a depleted Phoenix team. Coach Scott Brooks said he "flushed it out" at practice Monday in which he said he did most of the talking.
Bobcats coach Larry Brown's words don't seem to be working anymore.
Stephen Jackson scored 20 points and Boris Diaw added 13 points, seven rebounds and eight assists for the Bobcats, who dropped their fourth straight as Brown continues to question their effort.
With Charlotte coming off its third loss of 31 or more points in 10 days, general manager Rod Higgins said before the game he was "navigating the waters" about possible trades, but added nothing was imminent.
Brown took aim at his players about two hours before tipoff.
"If you don't play hard and you don't play together and you don't try to defend and rebound, you play like we play," he said.
But while Brown said they needed a "personality change" instead of a lineup change, he did make some moves.
Kwame Brown replaced Nazr Mohammed at center and Matt Carroll started in place of Dominic McGuire with Gerald Wallace missing his fourth straight game with a sprained left ankle.
Then point guard D.J. Augustin picked up two quick fouls. That gave Shaun Livingston and Sherron Collins, called up from the NBA Development League earlier in the day, big minutes in the first half.
The Bobcats lost Mohammed to a strained left hamstring in the third quarter, but were in the game until a nightmare final period.
After Jackson's three-point play to end the third, the Bobcats disintegrated with a stagnant offense and multiple mistakes. Charlotte hit 4-of-16 shots as Brown couldn't find a combination that worked.
Even with the Thunder again without center Nenad Krstic (back), they enjoyed a 44-32 edge on the glass and took 10 more free throws.
Notes: Westbrook drew gasps with his one-handed stab of Collins' bullet pass at midcourt before feeding Durant for a dunk in the second quarter. ... The Thunder were hopeful Krstic would be able to play, but Brooks said his back stiffened up after Tuesday's workout. He was seen getting his lower back iced after shootaround. "There's no pressure on him to return," Brooks said. ... Bobcats owner Michael Jordan wasn't in his courtside seat.

description.hltext_display: Новый штамм вируса гриппа выявлен на территории Монголии — ТК «Альтес»
description.content:
МониторингВерсия для печатиНашли ошибку в тексте?
Новый штамм вируса гриппа выявлен на территории Монголии. Инфекция может проникнуть и в Забайкалье.
Сюжет об этом вышел в эфире телекомпании «Альтес» 13 декабря.
«Заболевших на территории Монголии пока 17 человек, но специалисты обеспокоены: вирус неизвестный, и никто не знает, чем он опасен. Чтобы его изучить, в соседнюю страну уже вылетели специалисты из Иркутска», - сообщил журналист телекомпании.
Журналист уточняет, что вакцина, которой в этом году прививали население Забайкалья, защищает от трёх видов гриппа: пандемического, обычного сезонного и гриппа типа B. Специалисты отмечают, что пока вспышки гриппа не зафиксированы, и наблюдается лишь незначительный подъём заболеваемости ОРВИ среди детей.
Обзор электронных СМИ опубликован на «Чита.Ру» 22 декабря.

description.hltext_display: 第一届安徽创业者大会将于1月15日召开
description.author: dlgboy
description.content:
2011年1月15日，由安徽互联网联盟和落伍者联合主办，中国站长俱乐部、炎黄网络、百度创业者俱乐部、k666科技等协办的第一届安徽互联网创业者大会暨第四届安徽站长年会将在安徽中国科技学技术大学学术报告厅召开。
本次会议以“创业英雄”为主题，主要围绕2010年安徽互联网业界关注的团购、微博、地方社区、电子商务等热点展开讨论。通过嘉宾演讲、圆桌讨论、公开交流等方式，将为安徽创业者明晰未来发展方向，促进安徽互联网繁荣。
据了解，安徽互联网经过几年的发展，目前已经拥有十几万中小网站，并涌现出合肥热线、合肥团购、合肥房地产交易网 、安徽团购、安徽招聘网、52PK游戏网、久久结婚网等一大批互联网创业公司，发展前景看好，创业环境较为宽容、自由。一年一度的安徽站长年会都会吸引大量站长参与，本届创业者大会，预计吸引500名以上的站长和创业者参加。
此外，根据本次大会的“创业英雄”主题，主办方将邀请Discuz！创始人戴志康、落伍者论坛董勤峰、华军软件园华军等人，现场为安徽站长分享自己的创业经历与感悟，并就站长关心的团购、微博营销等互联网热点及地方社区运营、社区电子商务进行主题演讲，为创业者们指点迷津。
据悉，本次大会还邀请了多家平面和网络媒体对会议进行全程报道。包括安徽本地多家报纸媒体及腾讯科技、搜狐科技、站长之家、站长网、站长家园等是本地大会的支持媒体。搜狐微博和合肥微博将承担此次会议的微博直播支持。主办方还将在大会现场举办抽奖活动，奖品为IPAD等各种精美礼品。
本次大会免费报名地址： http://2010.ahunion.org

description.hltext_display: N.Y. sues Ernst & Young in Lehman Brothers probe
description.content:
NEW YORK New York's attorney general is suing accounting giant Ernst & Young, accusing it of helping defunct investment bank Lehman Brothers hide billions of dollars in debt from investors even as it teetered on the brink of financial collapse. The civil lawsuit, filed by Attorney General Andrew Cuomo on Tuesday, days before he's due to be sworn in as the state's governor, marks the first government legal action stemming from the collapse of Lehman Brothers, one of the first milestones of Wall Street's 2008 meltdown.
It targets a practice known as "Repo 105," in which the lawsuit states Lehman Brothers made temporary overseas sales of securities, often lasting only days, and then used the money to pay off debts ahead of key quarterly reports to investors.
The system allowed the company to hold on to the inventory required by its customers while concealing debts from nervous investors, who otherwise might have sold off their shares.
The lawsuit claims that, as auditor, Ernst & Young signed off on the practice with full understanding that it was being used to deceive investors. From the launch of "Repo 105" in 2001 until the Lehman Brothers bankruptcy in 2008, Ernst & Young was paid more than $150 million for its auditing and accounting work for Lehman Brothers.
Defendants fight back
Ernst & Young said in a statement that it would defend itself in court and called the lawsuit "a significant expansion of the Martin Act" used to prosecute the case.
"There is no factual or legal basis for a claim to be brought against an auditor in this context where the accounting for the underlying transaction is in accordance with the Generally Accepted Accounting Principles," the statement said. "Lehman's audited financial statements clearly portrayed Lehman as a highly leveraged entity operating in a risky and volatile industry."
The lawsuit claims the accounting firm betrayed the public's trust.
"At a time when it was critical for investors to make informed decisions as to whether to keep or buy Lehman stock, E&Y assisted Lehman in defrauding the public," the lawsuit claims. "Lehman had no legitimate business reason to enter into such transactions, and could have obtained sufficient financing through less costly means."
Even though Lehman Brothers was legally obligated to buy back the "Repo 105" securities within a brief time, the company reported the transactions as sales rather than loans, the lawsuit claims. As much as
$50 billion in Lehman assets were shuffled in the transactions, the lawsuit states.
Such massaging of the numbers is commonplace, but usually firms explain their practices in footnotes on quarterly reports, said Arthur Bowman, who publishes the accounting industry newsletter Bowman's Accounting Report. To his knowledge, this is the first time the government has gone after an accounting firm for its part in the Wall Street debacle, Bowman said.
The lawsuit is seeking unspecified restitution and damages, and it also asks that Ernst & Young give more than $150 million in Lehman Brothers fees earned since 2001 to New York state.

event_or_fact.property: To his knowledge, this is the first time the government has gone after an accounting firm for its part in the Wall Street debacle

description.hltext_display: Now pay your electricity bills to a...
description.content:
Jalandhar: A machine to collect your electricity bills has been established by the Punjab Powercom in the city as apart of a programme to provide customers with better services.
The machine was inaugurated by the senior engineer Jagjeet Singh Suchu. He said that R 3 lakh were spent on setting up the machine in which bills can be deposited from 7:00 am to 11:00 pm. The machine can collect bills in cash (upto R 5000 only) or as drafts.
On receiving a deposit the machine will provide the depositor a receipt. An employee has been appointed to operate the machine

description.hltext_display: Waffen und Atomkraftwerke: Russland und Indien unterzeichnen Verträge
description.content:
Schlagwörter: Indien Russland Waffen
Indien, das große Land in Südasien, spielt in diesen Jahren eine immer größere Rolle in der Geopolitik. Alle Großmächte möchten nun das Land für sich gewinnen. Nach den USA und China kam nun Dimitri Medwedjew nach Neu-Delhi.
Die wirtschaftliche Entwicklung und die wichtige geografische Lage Indiens ermöglicht es dem Land, eine größere Wirkung auf die internationale Politik auszuüben. Ein Verbessern seiner Position in der internationalen Gemeinschaft ist dadurch gekennzeichnet, dass die Spitzenpolitiker aller fünf ständigen Mitgliedsstaaten des UN-Sicherheitsrats, China, USA, Frankreich, Großbritannien und Russland, in den letzten sechs Monaten dem Land aufeinanderfolgend einen Besuch abstatteteten. Inklusive der Abkommen mit Russland, dessen Präsident gestern Indien besuchte, hat Indien nun Handelsverträge im Wert von 50 Milliarden US-Dollar von den "Big 5" bekommen.
Bei seinem Besuch haben Medwedjew und sein Amtskollege Manmohan Singh die bilateralen Beziehungen in Politik und Handel enorm verstärkt. Der russische Präsident bekräftigte wiederholt, sein Land unterstütze Indien, ein ständiges Mitglied des UN-Sicherheitsrats zu werden. Beide Länder haben vor, das heutige Handelsvolumen von etwa zehn Milliarden US-Dollar in den nächsten fünf Jahren zu verdoppeln.
Russland und Indien haben parallel Verträge für den Handel mit Waffen und den Bau von Atomkraftwerken unterzeichnet. Beide Länder wollen gemeinsam zwei Atomkraftwerke in Tamil Nadu bauen und einen Kampfjet fünfter Generation in den kommenden zehn Jahren entwickeln. Die Kosten für die Waffenentwicklung von etwa 295 Millionen US-Dollar werden auf beide Länder verteilt.
Indien wird darüber hinaus 250 bis 300 russische Kampfjets importieren. Zwar hat keine der Seiten Informationen über Details des Waffenimports gegeben, Medienberichte schätzen jedoch, dass der Deal insgesamt 35 Milliarden US-Dollar schwer ist. Seit dem Kalten Krieg beherrschte die Sowjetunion beziehungsweise später Russland für eine lange Zeit den Waffenmarkt in Indien. Aber in den letzten Jahren sah sich Russland mit Konkurrenz aus Europa und den USA konfrontiert.

description.hltext_display: Banks to defend Storm legal action by ASIC
description.content:
03 Macquarie Bank Ltd and the Bank of Queensland say they will vigorously defend legal action commenced against them by the corporate regulator over the collapse of Storm Financial Ltd.
The Australian Securities and Investments Commission (ASIC) on Wednesday said it had lodged court action against Commonwealth Bank, Bank of Queensland Ltd and Macquarie Group Ltd to seek compensation for investors who suffered losses in the collapse of Storm.
Macquarie Bank responded by saying it will defend the legal proceedings, which it called "unsustainable and speculative".
"Macquarie maintains that its conduct and that of its staff has been ethical, lawful and professional," the company said in a statement.
"There is a fundamental difference between the role of a margin lender and that of Storm, a financial adviser licensed by ASIC."
BoQ said it intended to vigorously defend the action based on legal advice that the bank did not act illegally or dishonestly.
The Federal Court proceedings allege unconscionable conduct under the Trade Practices Act against the Bank of Queensland, the owner and franchisee of the BoQ's North Ward branch (Senrac Pty Ltd) and Macquarie Bank Ltd.
ASIC says further proceedings were lodged against Storm, Commonwealth Bank of Australia, BoQ and Macquarie Bank Ltd based on an alleged unregistered managed investment scheme operated by Storm.
ASIC chairman Tony D'Aloisio said ASIC commenced the legal action as it was not able to reach a commercial resolution with the banks.
"Unfortunately, discussions did not result in a satisfactory outcome and it has been necessary for ASIC to bring these proceedings," Mr D'Aloisio said in a statement.
As foreshadowed, ASIC has also filed civil penalty proceedings in the Federal Court against Emmanuel and Julie Cassimatis as directors of Storm in relation to alleged contraventions of their duties as directors under the Corporations Act.
ASIC said its investigations into the collapse of Storm are continuing.
BoQ managing director David Liddy said the bank had a responsibility to all stakeholders and it would be irresponsible not to fight the action.
"In saying that, we have every sympathy for customers who lost money through the collapse of Storm Financial; we too put faith in the regulatory system and can understand our customers' frustration at the collapse of a financial planner that had the tick of approval from government regulators," Mr Liddy said in the statement.
Law firm Slater and Gordon, which is undertaking a class action on behalf of Storm investors, welcomed the start of legal action by the ASIC.
"We welcome the commencement of legal proceedings against Emmanuel and Julie Cassimatis, who will finally be called to account for ruining the lives of so many everyday Australians with their one-size-fits-all financial advice," Slater and Gordon class action law expert Damian Scattini said.
Mr Scattini said Slater and Gordon would continue to pursue test cases commenced against BoQ by clients of the firm.
"These claims are well advanced. We view ASIC's litigation against BoQ as the opening a second front in the battle for compensation."
Storm Financial went into administration in January 2009 and was placed in liquidation in March that year owing $3.6 billion to an estimated 14 000 investors, many of whom were small investors.

description.hltext_display: 关于搜狗输入法在360软件管家升级故障的公告
description.author: dlgboy
description.content:
近日，大量搜狗拼音输入法的用户向搜狗科技反馈，在使用360软件管家升级安装搜狗拼音输入法最新版本之后，出现无法正常使用的情况。为保障用户利益、确保搜狗输入法良好的使用体验，搜狗特做如下紧急公告：
1、经网友反馈和我们的技术人员调查发现，用户在使用360软件管家升级安装搜狗拼音输入法5.1.1.4954版本后，将普遍出现“只能输入英文字符，无法输入中文”的故障。本着用户至上的原则，我们正积极与360方面进行沟通解决。在此之前，敬请广大用户暂时不要使用360软件管家升级搜狗拼音输入法。
2、对于已经通过360软件管家升级安装并出现上述故障的用户，首先请将系统默认输入法设为“美式键盘”或其他输入法后重启电脑，然后从搜狗拼音输入法官网首页下载最新版本安装包（http://pinyin.sogou.com ），重新进行安装，即可解决问题。
3、根据我们调查了解，除360软件管家提供的升级版本外，通过其他软件下载渠道下载、升级的搜狗拼音输入法相应版本，均未发现上述问题，请广大搜狗用户放心升级使用。
搜狗公司
2010年12月22日

description.hltext_display: Auch im verschneiten Winter eine gute Wahl: Carports von Designo Carport
description.content:
Drucken 21.12.2010, 18:05 Uhr, Bau & Immobilien
Ungeahnte Vorteile durch die Anschaffung eines Carports
Die Nachfrage nach stylischen Carports wird immer größer, denn der Unterstellplatz wird immer beliebter bei jung und alt. Und sie können individuell auf viele Wünsche angepasst werden. Dank der Verwendung verschiedener Materialien, wie Acryl, Putz, Holz oder Stahlwelle können die Carports unterschiedlich gestaltet werden. Egal ob eine offene Bauweise mit Acrylglas, eine privatere mit Stahlwelle oder Putz oder eine Kombination aus Holz und Edelstahl-Drahtseilen gewählt wird, jeder Wunsch kann umgesetzt werden. Die Carports von Designo www.designo-carport.de müssen nicht mehr aufwendig gepflegt werden, denn eine innovative Pulverbeschichtung macht sie besonders haltbar und pflegeleicht.
Auf der modernen Webseite des Herstellers www.designo-carport.de werden Interessenten bereits viele Fragen beantwortet - falls jedoch noch einige offen bleiben, stehen die Mitarbeiter unter der kostenlosen Hotline 0800 - 2460012 jederzeit zur Verfügung und informieren Kunden über zahlreiche ungeahnte Möglichkeiten, denn die Carports variieren nicht nur im Material, sondern auch bei der Größe und Farbe. Zusätzlich können die Einzelcarports und Doppelcarports mit einem Geräteraum ausgestattet werden, der entweder im Carport integriert wird oder seitlich gelegen ist. Neben Gartengeräte finden hier auch Fahrräder, Gartenmöbel und Mülltonnen einen sicheren und geschützten Platz.

description.hltext_display: Drive against house-tax defaulters in...
description.content:
Ludhiana: The Municipal Corporation sealed two buildings and recovered more than R 5 lakh in a drive against house tax defaulters.
A team led by the superintendent of the D-Zone, Hartej Singh, sealed an Automated Teller Machine (ATM) of a bank at Kaisar Complex on Malhar Road. The bank had not paid R 25000.
Later the team sealed for shops in a building at Civil City in Boval. The owner was defaulting on payment of R 2 lakh approximately.
Apart from these, the corporation officials also recovered R 5.5 lakh from other defaulters.

description.hltext_display: Aker Solutions In Share Purchase Deal With Jacobs Engineering
description.content:
STOCKHOLM -(Dow Jones)- Norwegian engineering services firm Aker Solutions ( AKSO.OS) said Wednesday it has agreed a share purchase deal with Jacobs Engineering Group Inc. (JEC), valued at approximately 5.5 billion Norwegian kroner ($913 million), to transfer operations within its process and construction business to the U.S. professional technical services firm.
The transfer doesn't include the U.S. EPC centre in Houston and the Union Construction business located in the U.S. and Canada, which will be part of the new Aker Contractors company.
Completion of the transaction will be subject to relevant merger control clearances and the parties expect to complete the transaction during the first quarter of 2011.
For Aker Solutions, the transaction is expected to have a positive net cash effect of approximately NOK3.8 billion, and a cash to treasury effect of approximately NOK4.2 billion.
The net gain for Aker Solutions, compared to the book value of the businesses, is estimated to be a total of NOK2.4 billion.
Aker Solutions will continue to operate the process and construction business area operations included under the share purchase agreement until the transaction has been completed.
-By Jens Hansegard, Dow Jones Newswires; +46-8-5451-3095; jens.hansegard@ dowjones.com

description.hltext_display: 5G独立空间 “云邮”领航商务邮
description.author: dlgboy
description.content:
时至今日，企业邮箱已成为企业日常办公的必备工具，3G时代来临，大空间、移动应用、统一通讯等各方面都具有一定优势的企业邮箱，更是成为企业商务应用最多的形式之一。对于商务人士来说，企业邮箱已不再满足于简单的基础收发邮件，3G时代，电子商务开始向移动商务发展，企业对邮箱的便捷性、综合处理能力提出了更高的要求。在这种需求下，如何提升企业邮箱的使用率和综合处理能力，尤其是专业的商务邮箱，已成为服务商和企业共同面对的问题。
日前，很多企业期盼能有一款可以应对当前办公环境的企业邮箱，既可保证员工随时随地及时有效的处理邮件，同时可以让出差在外的员工收发传真，对此，记者特别走访了提供企业邮箱服务的相关企业，其中新网互联自主创新“云邮”产品商务邮吸引了记者的关注。
据了解，“云邮商务版”是针对商务沟通中邮箱空间有大容量需求的客户量身定制的专属产品，每帐户独享5G的空间，满足企业用户海量邮件的收发需求。同时，“云邮商务版”还具有基础互联网和移动互联网双网络自由贯通的特点。云邮商务版突破企业邮箱应用的空间、网络、软件、硬件等的局限性，融合多种沟通和通信方式，汇集了邮件、短信、即时通讯、电子传真、手机邮箱等多种功能，成为3G时代企业移动商务应用的最佳选择，构筑企业在基础互联网和移动互联网上的统一通讯平台。
使用“云邮商务版”，只需在邮箱设置中绑定自己的手机号码，就可以通过手机发送短信“邮件”到12114，点击返回的链接，直达自己的移动企业邮箱，无需输入用户名、密码，给企业商务移动办公带来了极大的便利。值得一提的是，在外出办公时经常会遇到需要处理传真文件的尴尬，借助“云邮商务版”便可实现直接在线发送和接收传真，将传真文件直接接收到电脑上，随时查看；同时避免传统传真机卡纸、掉线、占线、不好保存、耗费人力、耗材等问题，配备的全都是真实的传真号码；其还具有群发传真、电子签章等功能，通过系统设置生成电子签章，可加盖在要发送的传真上实现在线签发文件。
此外，用户还可以下载云邮手机客户端，通过客户端程序运行后实现以企业组织架构为分组方式、针对相应联系人进行发送邮件、电话直呼、短信发送等多种移动应用。作为第二代企业邮箱的领航者，“云邮商务版”凭借简单实用、方便快捷、个性化的综合应用功能，很快得到企业的认可，也使其成为3G时代企业移动商务应用的最佳选择。

description.hltext_display: Reisechaos durch Schnee in Europa
description.content:
Schlagwörter: Europa Schnee
Frustrierte Reisende in Europa haben am Montag ihrem Ärger über die Unfähigkeit von Verkehrsbeamten, Flugzeuge, Rollbahnen und Schnellzugstrecken von Schnee und Eis zu befreien, Luft gemacht. Der Schnee hatte zu einem Reisechaos im Vorfeld der Feiertage und zu der Angst geführt, dass viele nicht rechtzeitig zu Weihnachten zu Hause ankommen.
Am schlimmsten betroffen war der Londoner Flughafen Heathrow, an dem Tausende von Reisenden über Nacht festsaßen, da immer mehr Flüge gestrichen werden mussten – und das, obwohl andere große Flughäfen in Europa nach sieben Tagen Verspätungen ihren normalen Betrieb wieder aufnahmen.
Der Bürgermeister von London, Boris Johnson, sagte zu der verzweifelten Lage, nachdem Großbritannien einen weiteren Tag mit Flug- und Zugverspätungen hinnehmen musste, er verstehe nicht, warum das Personal so lange brauche, um Schaufel, Bagger, Schneepflug und was immer man brauche, um den Schnee unter den Flugzeugen zu räumen und die Flugzeuge in Bewegung zu bringen, aufzunehmen. Kurz zuvor hatte British Airways die Kurzstreckenflüge von Heathrow für Montag gestrichen.
Die Flugverkehrskontrollbehörde Eurocontrol erklärte am Montag auf ihrer Webseite, die Situation in Heathrow sei "chaotisch" geworden. Die in Verlegenheit geratenen britischen Beamten versprachen, eine Untersuchung wegen der schlechten Arbeit im Verkehrsnetz anzustellen. Verkehrssekretär Philip Hammond plant, das Parlament wegen der Mängel anzusprechen, unter denen massive Verspätungen des Eurostar waren, der Großbritannien mit dem europäischen Festland verbindet.
Im riesigen Terminal 5 des Heathrower Flughafens mussten müde und verärgerte Passagiere lange Warterei mit wenigen Informationen hinnehmen. Die 20-jährige Amerikanerin Suzie Devoe war eine von vielen, die zwei Nächte auf dem Boden im Flughafen geschlafen haben, um zu versuchen, über die Feiertage nach Hause zu kommen. Sie versucht verzweifelt, einen Flug umzubuchen, so dass sie zurück nach Washington fliegen kann, um Weihnachten mit ihrer Familie zu verbringen. "Das Ganze ist ein absoluter Alptraum", meint sie. "Ich will einfach nur nach Hause, ich will bei meiner Familie sein. Aber ich hänge in der Luft." Hunderte von Passagieren kampierten über Nacht im Flughafen Heathrow, nachdem Flüge gestrichen worden waren oder Verspätung hatten.
Eine ähnliche Szene spielte sich auch am Flughafen in Brüssel ab, an dem Enteisungsmittel knapp wurden und wo Abflüge für Flugzeuge, die enteist werden mussten, bis mindestens Dienstagabend nicht bestätigt werden konnten, hieß es am Montag von dem Flughafen. Der Flughafen erklärte, die Knappheit an Enteisungsmittel liege an Transportproblemen in Frankreich, und die Wettervorhersage sei nicht positiv.
Auch in Deutschland lief der Flugbetrieb langsamer, obwohl der Frankfurter Flughafen frei von Schnee und Eis war. Beamte strichen dort am Montag rund 300 Flüge von insgesamt 1.340 planmäßigen Flügen wegen Problemen anderswo in Europa, wie der Flughafenbetreiber Fraport mitteilte.

description.hltext_display: Moti Mahal falls short of a nawab's feast
description.content:
Dishing out Mughlai cuisine, Moti Mahal is just another Karama restaurant
Burra kebab, Chicken butter masala
Image Credit: Megan Hirons Mahon/Gulf News
Food and love have much in common. When we are hungry, we fantasise about grand meals, cook up a feast in our heads, mentally salivate over food not easily accessible to us, like perfectly grilled lamb chops or spicy prawn curry. (I don't know what Freud would have to say about it.)
The joke amongst my friends is that I would spice my spices if I could. And they couldn't be more right. It takes every ounce of control I have not to add garam masala to pasta sauce and cardamom to iced tea. I love food but of all the food in the world, it is Indian food, with its abundant use of spices, that I love most.
On a Thursday night, in a fit of nostalgia, I went to Moti Mahal in Karama, eager to relish the meal I imagined. The informal eatery sees the chef exploring Mughlai cuisine by way of a culinary journey, with several detours along the Grand Trunk road (Indian and Pakistani cuisine). My hopes soared when the preface of the thick leather-bound menu book interestingly referred to Maulana Abul Kalam Azad, a political leader of the Indian independence movement, suggesting to the Shah of Iran that while in India, he must visit two places — Taj Mahal and Moti Mahal. Well, here, the menu proposes dishes you'd actually want to taste. The sheer volume of choices offered on tandoori dishes is an apt reflection of Mughlai cuisine.
Entrees skew toward the (relatively) familiar. We started off with you-can't-go-wrong paneer pudina tikka (Dh25) — cottage cheese marinated in mint and fenugreek paste and grilled to perfection — and burra kebab (Dh32) — lamb chops rubbed in spices and roasted in tandoor (a clay oven). Suffice to say, the appetisers we had didn't do much for me, each bite of paneer pudina tikka was completely off the mark — flavour and taste was missing, Burra kebab, which ideally should be succulently tender, taking kebab experience to new heights, was chewy with underdone spices.
Lip-smacking
Not to worry, all was not lost. I have heard my friends wax poetic until the cows come home about the legendary Moti Mahal in old Delhi, particularly noted for its lip-smacking chicken butter masala. Foodies drool over this dish with unabashed abandon and a visit to a Mughlai restaurant without ordering it is akin to blasphemy. Here the chef livens up the dish. With little discussion as to whether or not it's an "authentic" butter chicken, we savoured the creamy chicken curry, which blended well with butter naan. No wonder, 90 years after their creation, butter chicken continues to rule the roost.
Apart from butter chicken (Dh40), if I were to pick an all-time favourite prawn dish, it would undoubtedly have to be the Amritsari jheenga (Dh38) — fresh prawns gently cooked in a creamy curry tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves. But here it failed to pack a punch — the-thicker-than-usual gravy couldn't lure me for a second helping.
The highlight of my road-trip was this classy act — rogan gosht (Dh30). Lamb so tender and finely spiced that it tastes as though it took a whole pantry to produce.
To finish off with a sweet note, traditional desserts included gajar ka halwa (carrot pudding) and acquired-taste gulab jamun (sweet milk dumplings) among others.
Like the rest of the meal, it treads lightly on the palate — not a showy finale. If I had to sum up my experience, I'd say it's just another Karama restaurant, not making the familiar strange, but rather the labour showing more than the love.
Where: Moti Mahal, KaramaTel: 04-3365676
Must-haves: Rogan gosht and chicken butter masala
Decor: A mix of ethnic and modern style.

description.hltext_display: Horse racing: Tony McCoy chases Welsh National ambition
description.author: Our Correspondent
description.content:
BBC Sports Personality of the Year Tony McCoy has revealed his next ambition is to win the Coral Welsh National at Chepstow Racecourse.
And he could very well be riding the current favourite next Monday in the showpiece race of the year at the Home of Welsh racing.
Synchronised is the market leader with sponsors Coral bookmakers for the £100,000 race.
The seven-year-old racehorse is owned by Irish businessman J P McManus and trained by Jonjo O’Neill – the same as Tony McCoy’s winning ride Don’t Push It in last spring’s Aintree Grand National.
McCoy, who was voted BBC Sports Personality of the Year on Sunday with almost 300,000 votes, said: "I’d like to win a Welsh National.
"I’ve been lucky enough to win the other Nationals, but I’ve not ridden in too many at Chepstow.”
Synchronised is one of 32 horses left in the Coral Welsh National. A maximum of 20 will take part in the three and three quarter mile race on Monday.
They include last year’s winning horse Dream Alliance, which was bred in Wales just 30 miles from Chepstow Racecourse.
Hills Of Aran could also represent Wales – the horse is stabled with trainer Keith Goldsworthy in Pembrokeshire.
There are still several Irish-trained horses in the running, while the top weight Silver By Nature will represent Scottish trainer Lucinda Russell in the race.
With Christmas Day falling on a Saturday this year, Monday, December 27 is a holiday and that will make a trip to Chepstow Racecourse a very popular day out.
The first race is at 12.25pm. Gates open at 9.55am, and visitors are urged to come as early as possible.
Coral Welsh National day – Monday, December 27: Tickets are available on the day – Grandstand & Paddock Enclosure £26; Premier Enclosure £36. Accompanied children aged under 16 are admitted free of charge. Senior citizens and students with appropriate identification get a £5 discount; and one carer is admitted free with a disabled badge holder. More details at www.chepstow-racecourse.co.uk.
TOWCESTER’S fixture on Boxing Day is the first meeting after Christmas to have been abandoned.
The course is currently frozen and, to compound matters, 10 inches of snow have also fallen.
Given that forecasters suggest the thaw is not going to start until Christmas Day at the earliest, course officials made an early decision.
Market Rasen’s meeting on Boxing Day is subject to a 12pm inspection today.

description.hltext_display: Delovni čas 24. in 31. 12. 2010
description.content:
Ob prijavi je vzpostavljena varna povezava (SSL). Naši sodelavci ne bodo nikoli po elektronski pošti ali telefonu zahtevali, da sporočite svoje podatke za dostop oz. PIN ali dinamično geslo.
V primeru težav z dostopom do elektronske banke HYPOnet in v primeru vsebinskih vprašanj (vnos nalogov, oddaja naročil, prikaz podatkov, ...) vas prosimo, da nas kontaktirate na telefonsko št. 01/58-04-300, vsak delovni dan med 07:30 in 16:30 uro. Lahko pa nam pošljete tudi sporočilo na elektronski naslov help.hyponet@hypo.si. Zgolj in samo v primeru izgube ali kraje generatorja dinamičnih gesel ali kakršnekoli zlorabe elektronske banke HYPOnet pa vam je zgoraj navedena telefonska številka na voljo 24 ur dan, 365 dni v letu.

description.hltext_display: Stratu vodičského preukazu treba nahlásiť do siedmich dní
description.content:
Za vydanie nového vodičského preukazu po jeho strate alebo odcudzení si zaplatíte.
BRATISLAVA. V prípade straty, odcudzenia alebo zničenia vodičského preukazu je jeho držiteľ povinný túto skutočnosť do siedmich dní oznámiť polícii. Ako informovala hovorkyňa Prezídia Policajného zboru (PPZ) Denisa Baloghová, pri podaní žiadosti o vydanie nového vodičského alebo medzinárodného vodičského preukazu musí občan v takomto prípade zaplatiť správny poplatok.
V prípade odcudzenia zaplatí 6,50 eura. "Za náhradu zničeného, strateného alebo poškodeného je správny poplatok vo výške 13 eur," uviedla s tým, že ide o sumy v prípade vydania náhrady do 30 dní. Na výslovnú žiadosť vodiča je ale možné vyhotoviť vodičský preukaz urýchlene do dvoch pracovných dní, pričom správny poplatok sa vtedy vyberie do výšky štvornásobku príslušnej sadzby, " čiže pri výmene a odcudzení je to 26 eur a pri strate alebo poškodení 52 eur," spresnila hovorkyňa.
Podľa súčasnej právnej úpravy je síce lehota na vydanie dokladu do 30 dní odo dňa podania žiadosti, avšak štandardne ich polícia podľa Baloghovej vydáva do 10 až 14 dní.

description.hltext_display: Jewelry worth lakhs stolen during...
description.content:
Ludhiana: Jewelry shops in Haibowal area have become easy targets for thieves. On Monday night jewlery worth lakhs was stolen from the shop of Guru Harkrishna Jewelers. It should be remembered that a few days back a similar case was reported from a jewelry shop at Jassian Road in Haibowal.
The owner of the shop, Dipak, said that he came to know about the theft only the next morning when he received call from the neighbouring shop-owners. He reported about the incident to the police who reached the shop and began their investigation.
It appeared that the safe of the shop was opened using a gas-cutter. The police have also recovered a digging tool and a handkerchief from the crime scene. The shop-owner said that safe contained around 45 grams of gold and more than 2 kg of silver utensils.

description.hltext_display: Rose, Deng lead Bulls to 121-76 rout of 76ers
description.content:
CHICAGO Derrick Rose and Luol Deng each scored 22 points, and the Chicago Bulls beat the Philadelphia 76ers 121-76 on Tuesday night for their eighth win in nine games.
Despite missing two big men, Chicago dominated nearly every offensive category and recorded its most lopsided win of the season.
Rose also had 12 assists for his seventh double-double, while Carlos Boozer had 16 points and 11 rebounds, and Kurt Thomas added 12 points.
Andre Iguodala scored 17 points and reserve Thaddeus Young added 12 for Philadelphia.
Chicago trailed only in the opening minute, then used a 10-0 run later in the first quarter to open its first double-digit lead. The advantage grew to 90-50 with 1:01 left in the third and 50 with less than five minutes to play.
Chicago was without 6-foot-9 forward Taj Gibson, who suffered a concussion during last Sunday's 100-99 home loss to the Clippers. He was the second Bulls big man sidelined in the last week following Joakim Noah's thumb surgery last Thursday.
Rose shook off a sore right wrist but scored 11 points in the first quarter. Deng added 10 as the Bulls opened a 33-19 lead. Chicago made 10 of its first 14 shots (71 percent) in the first 8:40.
The Bulls' lead never slipped under 10 points in the second quarter. Korver had eight points off the bench, including a pair of 3-pointers to help the Bulls to a 61-43 lead by intermission.
The lead passed 30 points during a 16-0 run and hit 40 with 1:01 remaining when Rose hit his second 3 pointer of the game to open a 90-50 lead. James Johnson's two free throws with less than five minutes to play pushed the lead past 50.
Chicago shot a season-high 64.5 percent, while Philadelphia managed just 28 of 80 (35 percent), its lowest of the season.
Notes: The crowd of 21,521 was the Bulls' 14th straight sellout this season. They led the NBA in average attendance entering the game with a 21,397 average.

event_or_fact.property: 10 as the Bulls opened a 33-19 lead

description.hltext_display: 酷6网捐资助学 践行社会责任
description.author: dlgboy
description.content:
酷6网总编辑陈峰，履行社会责任是每个企业和每个公民应尽的职责，社会的可持续发展需要各方力量共同努力。酷6网不仅为广大网民提供丰富多元的视频节目、新闻播报等，更倡导一种积极向上的生活态度和生活方式。随着社会的不断进步，每个人或每个企业都应该比以往任何时候更积极、谨慎地去思考获得与贡献。酷6网作为公益先行的视频媒体，曾多次以切身行动参与公益，不论是“小运发”，还是“减法生活”等酷6都积极参与其中。此外，酷6网积极呼吁更多的网友关注需要关爱的人们、伸出援手尽一份绵薄之力。
业内专家认为，做负责任的企业，做社会主流精神和文化的引领者，恰恰是视频网站在社会信仰缺失的转型时期，获得网民肯定与认可的重要原因。如今，酷6网在为教育和慈善事业做着努力，在创造经济价值的同时，坚持以实际行动回馈社会，并且利用其媒体属性影响着网民关注中国公益事业，这将赢得社会的广泛尊重。
